Application.name: ServiceNow

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique ID generated by system for user

AttributeDefinition.name: calendar_integration
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines whether change requests assigned to that user are sent to their Outlook calendar

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_created_on
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date this user is created in ServiceNow

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_created_by
AttributeDefinition.Description: Administrator who created the user in ServiceNow

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups the user is part of

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of roles the user is part of

AttributeDefinition.name: active
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines whether the user account has been staged for use

AttributeDefinition.name: password_needs_reset
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines should the user be prompted to change password at next login

AttributeDefinition.name: home_phone
AttributeDefinition.Description: Home phone number of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: ldap_server
AttributeDefinition.Description: LDAP server the user has an account. Identifies which LDAP server authenticates the user when there are multiple LDAP servers

AttributeDefinition.name: last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last login date of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: last_login_time
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time of the last login time for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: locked_out
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines if user account is locked

AttributeDefinition.name: notification
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines if the user should be notified for any changes made on his account.

AttributeDefinition.name: source
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies whether LDAP is used to validate a user. If the Source field starts with ldap, then the user is validated via LDAP. If the Source field does not start with ldap, then the password on the user record is used to validate the user upon login

AttributeDefinition.name: time_format
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time format selected for user to display time fields

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_updated_on
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last updated time for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_updated_by
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last update for the user occurred from

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_mod_count
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of updates for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: vip
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines if the user is treated as VIP

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles the user group is having

AttributeDefinition.name: parent
AttributeDefinition.Description: Parent group of this user group

AttributeDefinition.name: active
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines whether the user account has been staged for use

AttributeDefinition.name: cost_center
AttributeDefinition.Description: Cost centre of the user group

AttributeDefinition.name: default_assignee
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default assignee for the user group

AttributeDefinition.name: exclude_manager
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines if the manager should be excluded for the user group

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_created_on
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date the user group is created in ServiceNow

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_created_by
AttributeDefinition.Description: Administrator who created the user in ServiceNow

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique ID generated by system for user group

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_updated_on
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last updated time for the user group

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_updated_by
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last update for the user group occurred from

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_mod_count
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of updates for the user group

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_replace_on_upgrade
AttributeDefinition.Description: Replace to out of box version during next upgrade

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique ID generated by system for role

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_policy
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines how application files are protected when downloaded or installed

AttributeDefinition.name: elevated_privilege
AttributeDefinition.Description: This role is an elevated privilege

AttributeDefinition.name: sys_mod_count
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of updates for the role

All rights reserved. --> <Form xmlns="http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd" name="ServiceNow" connectorName="ServiceNow" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" shortDesc="ShortDesc" status="released" fileUpload="false"> <Menu name="ServiceNow Settings" label="con_form_servicenow_settings"> <Section name="ServiceNow Settings" label="con_form_servicenow_settings" sectionInfo="SectionInfo_AuthenticationType" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_servicenow" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/servicenow/help/"> <Field name="authtype" displayName="con_form_servicenow_auth_type" type="select" defaultValue="Basic" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_auth_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option label="con_form_servicenow_auth_type_normal" value="Basic" /> <Option label="con_form_servicenow_auth_type_oauth2" value="OAuth2" /> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="url" displayName="con_form_servicenow_url" requiredMessage="con_prov_policy_servicenow_url_null" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_url" type="url" required="true" /> <Field name="grant_type" displayName="con_form_servicenow_grant_type" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_grant_type" type="select" required="true" defaultValue="refresh_token" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="OAuth2"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="refresh_token" label="con_form_servicenow_refresh_token"/> <Option value="client_credentials" label="con_form_servicenow_client_credentials"/> </AllowedValues> </Field> <!-- Fields for 'Basic' authentication --> <Field name="username" displayName="con_form_servicenow_user_name" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_user_name" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="Basic" /> <Field name="password" displayName="pcon_form_servicenow_user_password" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_user_password" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="Basic" />
<!-- grant_type = client_credentials --> <Field name="token_url" displayName="con_form_servicenow_token_url" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_token_url" type="text" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="client_credentials" /> <Field name="clientId" displayName="con_form_servicenow_client_id" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_client_id" type="text" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="client_credentials" /> <Field name="clientSecret" displayName="con_form_servicenow_client_secret" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_client_secret" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="client_credentials" />
<!-- grant_type = refresh_token --> <Field name="clientId" displayName="con_form_servicenow_client_id" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_client_id" type="text" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="refresh_token" /> <Field name="clientSecret" displayName="con_form_servicenow_client_secret" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_client_secret" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="refresh_token" /> <Field name="refreshToken" displayName="con_form_servicenow_refresh_token" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_refresh_token" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="refresh_token" />
<Field name="pageSize" displayName="con_form_servicenow_page_size" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_page_size" type="number" saveAsString="true" defaultValue="1000" min="1" max="10000" /> <Field name="unlockOnEnableAccount" displayName="con_form_servicenow_unlock_on_enable_account" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_unlock_on_enable_account" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" /> </Section> </Menu>
<!-- Aggregation Filter Settings--> <Menu name="Aggregation Filter Settings" label="con_form_servicenow_filter_attribute_string"> <Section name="Aggregation Filter Settings" label="con_form_servicenow_filter_attribute_string" sectionInfo="SectionInfo_FilterSettings" docLinkLabel="" docLink=""> <Field name="accountFilterAttribute" displayName="con_form_servicenow_filter_attribute_account" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_filter_attribute_account" type="text"/> <Field name="groupFilterAttribute" displayName="con_form_servicenow_filter_attribute_group" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_filter_attribute_group" type="text"/> <Field name="roleFilterAttribute" displayName="con_form_servicenow_filter_attribute_role" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_filter_attribute_role" type="text"/> <Field name="manageInheritedRole" displayName="con_form_servicenow_manage_inherited_roles" helpKey="help_con_servicenow_manage_inherited_roles" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" /> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: SuccessFactors LMS

AttributeDefinition.name: First Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The given name of a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Last Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The family name of a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Middle Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The middle initial of a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Address
AttributeDefinition.Description: The street address of a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: State
AttributeDefinition.Description: The state or province of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Active
AttributeDefinition.Description: Active can be (Y or N) or (Yes or No). The value N and the value No mean that the user is inactive. The value Y and the value Yes mean that the user is active.

AttributeDefinition.name: Postal
AttributeDefinition.Description: The postal code of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: StudentID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the unique ID of a user in the Learning Management System (LMS).

AttributeDefinition.name: PersonGUID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is an internally generated, immutable identifier for one person.

AttributeDefinition.name: ExternalID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is a mutable identifier for one person across all of SAP SuccessFactors HXM Suite.

AttributeDefinition.name: Is Fulltime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Is the user a full time employee?

AttributeDefinition.name: Job Location
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique ID of the user's physical location.

AttributeDefinition.name: Job Title
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique job CODE of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Security Domain
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security domain ID of the entity.

AttributeDefinition.name: Organization
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique ID of the organization that the entity belongs to.

AttributeDefinition.name: Primary Manager
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user ID of the user's supervisor.

AttributeDefinition.name: Has Access
AttributeDefinition.Description: Does the user have access to the Learning Management System (LMS)?

AttributeDefinition.name: Termination Date
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date that the user separated from the company.

AttributeDefinition.name: Locked
AttributeDefinition.Description: Is the user locked out of the system?

AttributeDefinition.name: Role
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the security role ID of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Profile Status
AttributeDefinition.Description: The status indicating if the student is an active employee.

AttributeDefinition.name: Native Deep Link User
AttributeDefinition.Description: Depending on how you set Native Deeplink User, you mark the user as either coming in from Human Experience Management (HXM) through the connector or a user who is native to learning.

AttributeDefinition.name: Employee Status
AttributeDefinition.Description: You can associate employees with a status that identifies their standing in the company (for example, full-time, on leave, or suspended).

AttributeDefinition.name: Regular/Temporary ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Companies use the regular temp ID to search and report on users in categories of their regular and temporary work.

AttributeDefinition.name: Item Type ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determine how users are marked complete for a learning item. One item type can have completion statuses of pass and fail while another might have completion statuses of pass, fail and incomplete.

AttributeDefinition.name: Revision date
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the revision date of this entity. Learning items often have revision dates that correspond to a regulator's revision of compliance measures.

AttributeDefinition.name: Item ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the unique ID of a learning item.

AttributeDefinition.name: Classification ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the unique ID of the classification for a learning item.It can be one of the following values: BLENDED, CONTINUOUS ONLINE ACCESS, EXTERNAL-COURSE, PHYSICAL GOOD, or TIME-BASED.

AttributeDefinition.name: Source ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The source is the developer of the learning item or the organization or regulatory body that requires it.

AttributeDefinition.name: Delivery Method ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the unique ID of a delivery method. A delivery method describes how a learning item will be delivered (for example, a book, PDF file, or online course).

AttributeDefinition.name: Domain ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the security domain ID of the entity.

AttributeDefinition.name: Curricula Title
AttributeDefinition.Description: The title of a curriculum in the system.

AttributeDefinition.name: Curricula ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Unique ID of a curriculum in the system.

AttributeDefinition.name: Domain ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the security domain ID of the entity.

AttributeDefinition.name: Curricula Type ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique ID of the curriculum type. Curricula types are ways to categorize curricula.

AttributeDefinition.name: Basis date
AttributeDefinition.Description: When the curriculum is calendar based, basis date is used to calculate the period. It is the starting line for retraining intervals. For example, if the user must retrain every year, and the basis date is January 1, the user must retrain every year by January 1.

AttributeDefinition.name: ForceIncomp
AttributeDefinition.Description: If Y, the system calculates whether the status of the curriculum should be Complete or Incomplete based on a users most recent attempt at completing any one item in the curriculum.

AttributeDefinition.name: Curricula Desc
AttributeDefinition.Description: The plain text description of the curriculum that the system returns.

AttributeDefinition.name: Program Title
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the title of a program.

AttributeDefinition.name: Program ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the unique ID of a program in SAP SuccessFactors Learning.

AttributeDefinition.name: Program Type
AttributeDefinition.Description: Learning program types describe how the user goes about completing a program.

AttributeDefinition.name: Domain ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the security domain ID of the entity.

AttributeDefinition.name: Assignment Type ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the assignment type of the entity.

AttributeDefinition.name: Description
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is a description of the program.

AttributeDefinition.name: Start Date
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the start date of the program. It applies only when the program type is SCHEDULE_BASED.

AttributeDefinition.name: End date
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the end date of the program. It applies only when the program type is SCHEDULE_BASED.

AttributeDefinition.name: LastName

Application.name: PeopleSoft HR/HCM

AttributeDefinition.name: PREF_FIRST_NAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Preferred first name of the employee

AttributeDefinition.name: COMPANY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Company of the employee for current job

AttributeDefinition.name: FULL_PART_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Full part time of the job

AttributeDefinition.name: HR_RESPONSIBLE_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: HR Responsible ID of the employee

Application.Settings:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- Copyright (C) 2021 SailPoint Technologies, Inc. All rights reserved. --> <Form xmlns="http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd" name="PeopleSoft HCM Database" connectorName="PeopleSoft HCM Database" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released" shortDesc="ShortDesc"> <Menu name="JDBC Connection Settings" label="jdbc_conn_settings"> <Section name="JDBC Connection Settings" label="jdbc_conn_settings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_connectionSettings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_connectionSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/oracle/peoplesoft_hcm/help/"> <Field name="url" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_MSSQL_url" helpKey="help_con_form_jdbc_url_of_database" defaultValue="jdbc:oracle:thin:@<HOST>:<PORT>:<SID>"/> <Field name="user" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_MSSQL_user" helpKey="help_con_form_db_user" defaultValue="system" /> <Field name="password" type="secret" required="true" displayName="con_form_MSSQL_password" helpKey="help_con_form_db_password"/> <Field name="driverClass" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_Oracle_driver" helpKey="help_con_form_driver" defaultValue="oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver" /> <Field name="chunkToFetch" displayName="con_form_page_size" helpKey="help_con_form_page_size" type="number" saveAsString="true" required="false" defaultValue="1000" min="1" max="5000" /> <Field name="SQL" type="textarea" required="true" displayName="main_query" helpKey="help_con_form_main_query" defaultValue="SELECT Person.EMPLID,Person.NAME_PREFIX,Person.NAME_SUFFIX,Person.FIRST_NAME,Person.LAST_NAME, Person.MIDDLE_NAME,Person.NAME,Person.NAME_TITLE,Person.ADDRESS1,Person.ADDRESS2,Person.ADDRESS3, Person.BIRTHDATE, Person.CITY,Person.COUNTRY,Person.PREF_FIRST_NAME,Person.POSTAL, Person.HR_RESPONSIBLE_ID,Person.STATE,Email.E_ADDR_TYPE,Email.EMAIL_ADDR,Phone.PHONE_TYPE,Phone.PHONE FROM PS_PERSONAL_DATA Person LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT tempPerson.EMPLID,tempEmail.E_ADDR_TYPE,tempEmail.EMAIL_ADDR FROM PS_PERSONAL_DATA tempPerson LEFT OUTER JOIN PS_EMAIL_ADDRESSES tempEmail ON tempPerson.EMPLID = tempEmail.EMPLID WHERE tempEmail.E_ADDR_TYPE='BUSN') Email ON Person.EMPLID = Email.EMPLID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT tempPerson.EMPLID,tempPhone.PHONE,tempPhone.PHONE_TYPE FROM PS_PERSONAL_DATA tempPerson LEFT OUTER JOIN PS_PERSONAL_PHONE tempPhone ON tempPerson.EMPLID = tempPhone.EMPLID WHERE tempPhone.PHONE_TYPE='BUSN') Phone ON Person.EMPLID = Phone.EMPLID AND Email.EMPLID = Phone.EMPLID WHERE Person.EMPLID>? ORDER BY Person.EMPLID" /> <Field name="getObjectSQL" type="textarea" displayName="objectSQL" helpKey="help_con_form_object_query" defaultValue="SELECT Person.EMPLID,Person.NAME_PREFIX,Person.NAME_SUFFIX,Person.FIRST_NAME,Person.LAST_NAME, Person.MIDDLE_NAME,Person.NAME,Person.NAME_TITLE,Person.ADDRESS1,Person.ADDRESS2,Person.ADDRESS3, Person.BIRTHDATE, Person.CITY,Person.COUNTRY,Person.PREF_FIRST_NAME,Person.POSTAL, Person.HR_RESPONSIBLE_ID,Person.STATE,Email.E_ADDR_TYPE,Email.EMAIL_ADDR,Phone.PHONE_TYPE,Phone.PHONE FROM PS_PERSONAL_DATA Person LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT tempPerson.EMPLID,tempEmail.E_ADDR_TYPE,tempEmail.EMAIL_ADDR FROM PS_PERSONAL_DATA tempPerson LEFT OUTER JOIN PS_EMAIL_ADDRESSES tempEmail ON tempPerson.EMPLID = tempEmail.EMPLID WHERE tempEmail.E_ADDR_TYPE='BUSN') Email ON Person.EMPLID = Email.EMPLID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT tempPerson.EMPLID,tempPhone.PHONE,tempPhone.PHONE_TYPE FROM PS_PERSONAL_DATA tempPerson LEFT OUTER JOIN PS_PERSONAL_PHONE tempPhone ON tempPerson.EMPLID = tempPhone.EMPLID WHERE tempPhone.PHONE_TYPE='BUSN') Phone ON Person.EMPLID = Phone.EMPLID AND Email.EMPLID = Phone.EMPLID WHERE Person.EMPLID = '$(identity)'" /> <Field name="getSubSQL" type="textarea" displayName="sub_query" helpKey="help_con_form_sub_query" defaultValue="SELECT Job.EMPL_RCD,Job.PER_ORG,Job.DEPTID,Job.JOBCODE,Job.POSITION_NBR,Job.SUPERVISOR_ID,Job.HR_STATUS,Job.EMPL_STATUS,Job.ACTION,Job.ACTION_REASON,Job.LOCATION,Job.FULL_PART_TIME,Job.COMPANY,Job.EMPL_TYPE,Job.OFFICER_CD,Job.EMPL_CLASS,Job.ACCT_CD, Job.BUSINESS_UNIT,Job.REPORTS_TO,Job.TERMINATION_DT,Job.HIRE_DT, Job.JOB_INDICATOR,Job.EMPLID,Job.EFFDT FROM PS_JOB Job WHERE Job.EMPLID = '$(identity)' and Job.JOB_INDICATOR = 'P' AND Job.EFFDT = (SELECT MAX(Job1.EFFDT) FROM PS_JOB Job1 WHERE Job1.EMPLID = Job.EMPLID AND Job1.EMPL_RCD = Job.EMPL_RCD AND Job1.EFFDT <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND Job.EFFSEQ = (SELECT MAX(Job2.EFFSEQ) FROM PS_JOB Job2 WHERE Job2.EMPLID = Job.EMPLID AND Job2.EMPL_RCD = Job.EMPL_RCD AND Job2.EFFDT = Job.EFFDT)" /> <Field name="excludeInactive" type="checkbox" displayName="exclude_inactive" helpKey="help_con_exclude_inactive" defaultValue="false" /> <Field name="buildMapRule" type="select" displayName="con_form_sap_buildmap" helpKey="help_con_buildMap" method="post" url="/rest/applications/restricted/suggest/object/sailpoint.object.Rule" payload="{"filterString":"type==\"PeopleSoftHRMSBuildMap\""}"/> </Section> </Menu>

Application.name: Zendesk

AttributeDefinition.name: email
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary email address of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: active
AttributeDefinition.Description: The active status of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: alias
AttributeDefinition.Description: An alias displayed to end users.

AttributeDefinition.name: chat_only
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether or not the user is a chat-only agent.

AttributeDefinition.name: created_at
AttributeDefinition.Description: The creation time of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: custom_role_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: A custom role of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: role_type
AttributeDefinition.Description: The role ID of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: details
AttributeDefinition.Description: Details about the user, such as an address.

AttributeDefinition.name: external_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier from another system.

AttributeDefinition.name: last_login_at
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last time the user signed in to Zendesk.

AttributeDefinition.name: locale_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The language identifier of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: moderator
AttributeDefinition.Description: Designates whether the user has forum moderation capabilities.

AttributeDefinition.name: only_private_comments
AttributeDefinition.Description: The value is true if the user can only create private comments.

AttributeDefinition.name: organization_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ID of the user's organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: default_group_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ID of default group of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: phone
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary phone number of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: shared_phone_number
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the phone number is shared or not.

AttributeDefinition.name: restricted_agent
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the restrictions of the agent.

AttributeDefinition.name: role
AttributeDefinition.Description: The role of the user. Possible values are "end-user", "agent", or "admin".

AttributeDefinition.name: shared
AttributeDefinition.Description: If the user is shared from a different Zendesk Support instance.

AttributeDefinition.name: shared_agent
AttributeDefinition.Description: If the user is a shared agent from a different Zendesk Support instance.

AttributeDefinition.name: suspended
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the suspension status of the agent.

AttributeDefinition.name: tags
AttributeDefinition.Description: The tags associated with the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: ticket_restriction
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies which tickets the user has access to.

AttributeDefinition.name: time_zone
AttributeDefinition.Description: The time zone of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: two_factor_auth_enabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the enablement status of two factor authentication.

AttributeDefinition.name: updated_at
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last updated time of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: url
AttributeDefinition.Description: The API URL of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: verified
AttributeDefinition.Description: Any of the user's identities is verified.

AttributeDefinition.name: report_csv
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the access of the CSV report on the Search tab of the Reporting page in the Support admin interface.

AttributeDefinition.name: organizations
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of all organizations attached to user.

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of all groups attach to user.

AttributeDefinition.name: url
AttributeDefinition.Description: The API URL of the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: default
AttributeDefinition.Description: If group is default for the account.

AttributeDefinition.name: updated_at
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last updated time of the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique name for the organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: details
AttributeDefinition.Description: Details about the organization, such as the address.

AttributeDefinition.name: group_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: New tickets from users in this organization are automatically put in this group.

AttributeDefinition.name: url
AttributeDefinition.Description: The API URL of the organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: external_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique external id to associate organizations to an external record.

AttributeDefinition.name: created_at
AttributeDefinition.Description: The creation time of the organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: updated_at
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last update time of the organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: domain_names
AttributeDefinition.Description: An array of domain names associated with this organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: shared_tickets
AttributeDefinition.Description: End users in this organization are able to see each other's tickets.

AttributeDefinition.name: shared_comments
AttributeDefinition.Description: End users in this organization are able to see each other's comments on tickets.

AttributeDefinition.name: tags
AttributeDefinition.Description: The tags associated with the organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ID of the custom role.

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the custom role.

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: The description of the custom role.

AttributeDefinition.name: created_at
AttributeDefinition.Description: The creation time of the custom role.

AttributeDefinition.name: updated_at
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last update time of the custom role.

<Menu>
<Section name="OpenLDAP - Direct Configuration" label="con_settings_open_ldap_direct_name" sectionInfo="con_settings_open_ldap_direct_name" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_ConnectionCredentials" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/openldap/help/">
<Field name="useSSL" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_ldap_use_ssl" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_use_ssl"/> <Field name="authorizationType" type="select" defaultValue="simple" displayName="con_form_ldap_auth_type" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_auth_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="simple" label="con_form_ldap_auth_type_simple"/> <Option value="none" label="con_form_ldap_auth_type_none"/> </AllowedValues> </Field>

<Field name="host" type="text" required="true" placeHolder="host.example.com" displayName="con_form_ldap_host" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_host"/> <Field name="port" type="number" required="true" defaultValue="389" displayName="con_form_ldap_port" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_port"/> <Field name="pageSize" type="number" defaultValue="100" displayName="con_form_ldap_page_size" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_page_size" saveAsString="true"/>

Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, AUTHENTICATE, PASSWORD, ENABLE, UNLOCK, SEARCH
Application.name: Webex

AttributeDefinition.name: RegistrationDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: The creation date of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Active
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines whether the user account has been staged for use.

AttributeDefinition.name: TimezoneID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines the time zone for the geographic location of the meeting.

AttributeDefinition.name: Description
AttributeDefinition.Description: A description of the users virtual office.

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A reference to the office category for the users office.

AttributeDefinition.name: AddressType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines whether the meeting participant is a personal contact of the meeting host or is a site-wide (global) contact.

AttributeDefinition.name: Phone
AttributeDefinition.Description: The users Office Profile phone number.

AttributeDefinition.name: Fax
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the fax number for the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Pager
AttributeDefinition.Description: The users Office Profile pager number.

AttributeDefinition.name: ExpirationDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: A WebEx-maintained date and time at which the users account expires.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserEmail
AttributeDefinition.Description: The email address as stored in the user profile.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserPhone
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the phone number for the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: MailInfo
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the mail information for the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: TimeZone
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines the time zone for the geographic location of the user or users office.

AttributeDefinition.name: TimeZoneWithDST
AttributeDefinition.Description: A timezone description which is adjusted by DST. For example, GMT-7:00, Pacific (San Francisco)

AttributeDefinition.name: Service
AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of service that the user has.

AttributeDefinition.name: Host
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user is the host for the meeting.

AttributeDefinition.name: TelephoneConferenceCallOut
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether conference calling out of meetings is supported for the meeting.

AttributeDefinition.name: TelephoneConferenceCallOutInternational
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether international calling out of meetings is supported for the meeting.

AttributeDefinition.name: TelephoneConferenceCallIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether conference calling into meetings is supported for the meeting.

AttributeDefinition.name: TelephoneConferenceTollFreeCallIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether toll-free calling into meetings is supported for the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: SiteAdmin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user has administrative privilege for the meeting.

AttributeDefinition.name: VOIP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether Voice Over IP telephony is enabled.

AttributeDefinition.name: SiteAdminwithViewOnly
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the current user is a site administrator with view only privilege.

AttributeDefinition.name: LabAdmin
AttributeDefinition.Description: If TRUE, then user has access to the Hands-on Lab administration pages.

AttributeDefinition.name: OtherTeleConferencing
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether a user account has the privilege to schedule a session with the other teleconferencing feature enabled.

AttributeDefinition.name: TeleConferenceCallInInternational
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allows a user to access WebEx teleconferencing through international local call-in telephone numbers.

AttributeDefinition.name: AttendeeOnly
AttributeDefinition.Description: If the value is TRUE, indicates that the users role is attendee only. If the value is set to TRUE, then the host, siteAdmin, labAdmin and roSiteAdmin elements should be FALSE.

AttributeDefinition.name: RecordingEditor
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether a user has the privilege to download WebEx Recording Editor from My WebEx > Support.

AttributeDefinition.name: MeetingType
AttributeDefinition.Description: The meeting types of which the account is a part of.

AttributeDefinition.name: GroupName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the group or meeting type.

AttributeDefinition.name: ProductCodePrefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the product label for the type of meeting.

AttributeDefinition.name: Active
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the type of meeting represented by an object of this type is enabled or disabled.

AttributeDefinition.name: DisplayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name for the meeting type.

AttributeDefinition.name: PrimaryTollCallInNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The telephone number for a toll call-in teleconference.

AttributeDefinition.name: PrimaryTollFreeCallInNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The telephone number for a toll free call-in teleconference.

AttributeDefinition.name: MeetingTypeID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies IDs for the meeting types whose detailed information you want to get.

AttributeDefinition.name: ServiceType
AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of meeting being returned.

Application.name: RACFLDAP Template

AttributeDefinition.name: racfAttributes
AttributeDefinition.Description: RACF Attributes Pertaining To This User

AttributeDefinition.name: racfClassName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Classes in which user is allowed to define profiles

AttributeDefinition.name: racfConnectGroupName
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups a RACF User is a member

AttributeDefinition.name: racfProgrammerName
AttributeDefinition.Description: User name associated with the RACF user ID

AttributeDefinition.name: racfPasswordChangeDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date user changed his password

AttributeDefinition.name: racfPasswordInterval
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days during which a user's password and password phrase (if set) remain valid

AttributeDefinition.name: racfPassPhraseChangeDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date user changed his passphrase

AttributeDefinition.name: racfResumeDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Starting date when user will be allowed to access the system again

AttributeDefinition.name: racfRevokeDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Starting date when user will be disallowed to access the system

AttributeDefinition.name: racfSecurityCategoryList
AttributeDefinition.Description: User access to resources is additionally protected by the security categories

AttributeDefinition.name: racfLogonDays
AttributeDefinition.Description: Days of the week when the user is allowed to access the system from a terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: racfLogonTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Hours in the day when the user is allowed to access the system from a terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: racfAuthorizationDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when user was defined to RACF

AttributeDefinition.name: racfDatasetModel
AttributeDefinition.Description: Discrete data set profile name that is used as a model when new data set profiles are created that have userid as the high-level qualifier

AttributeDefinition.name: racfOperatorClass
AttributeDefinition.Description: classes assigned to this operator to which BMS (basic mapping support) messages are to be routed - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: racfOperatorIdentification
AttributeDefinition.Description: Operator ID for use by BMS - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: racfOperatorPriority
AttributeDefinition.Description: Priority of the operator - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: racfTerminalTimeout
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time, in hours and minutes, that the operator is allowed to be idle before being signed off. - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: racfOperatorReSignon
AttributeDefinition.Description: FORCE means that the user is signed off by CICS when an XRF takeover occurs - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFAccountNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default TSO account number when logging on - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFDefaultCommand
AttributeDefinition.Description: Command run during TSO logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFDestination
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default destination to which the system routes dynamically-allocated SYSOUT data sets - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFTsoSecurityLabel
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security label entered or used during TSO LOGON - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFDefaultUnit
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default name of a device or group of devices that a procedure uses for allocations - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFDefaultLoginProc
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default logon procedure name when logging on through TSO logon panel - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFLogonSize
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default or requested region size during TSO logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFMaximumRegionSize
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum region size the user can request at logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: SAFUserdata
AttributeDefinition.Description: Optional installation data defined for the user - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: racfGroupNoTermUAC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether the users present in group are having universal access authority (UACC) to the Terminal

Application.name: Microsoft SharePoint Online

AttributeDefinition.name: Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: It specifies all the groups to which user belongs to.

AttributeDefinition.name: SiteCollections
AttributeDefinition.Description: It specifies all the Site Collections to which user belongs to.

AttributeDefinition.name: AdminOfSites
AttributeDefinition.Description: It specifies all the Site Collections to which user is admin of.

AttributeDefinition.name: Group URL
AttributeDefinition.Description: URL to group in a site collection.

AttributeDefinition.name: AutoAcceptRequestToJoinLeave
AttributeDefinition.Description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the request to join or leave the group can be accepted automatically.

AttributeDefinition.name: AllowMembersEditMembership
AttributeDefinition.Description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the group members can edit membership in the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: RequestToJoinLeaveEmailSetting
AttributeDefinition.Description: Gets or sets the email address to which the requests of the membership are sent.

AttributeDefinition.name: OnlyAllowMembersViewMembership
AttributeDefinition.Description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether only group members are allowed to view the membership of the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: AllowRequestToJoinLeave
AttributeDefinition.Description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allow users to request membership in the group and request to leave the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: uid
AttributeDefinition.Description: The numerical value of the user's ID

AttributeDefinition.name: inactive
AttributeDefinition.Description: The number of days of inactivity allowed for that user

AttributeDefinition.name: lock_after_retries
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether an account is locked after the count of failed logins for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: limitpriv
AttributeDefinition.Description: The maximum set of privileges a User can obtain

AttributeDefinition.name: defaultpriv
AttributeDefinition.Description: The default set of privileges assigned to a user's inheritable set upon login

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdminage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Minimum number of days between password change

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdmaxage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of days between password change

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdwarn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days of warning before password expires

AttributeDefinition.name: audit_flags
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies per-user audit preselection flags as colon-separated always-audit-flags and never-audit-flags

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups which the user is a member of

AttributeDefinition.name: groupid
AttributeDefinition.Description: The numerical value of the group's ID

AttributeDefinition.name: PublicGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Public groups are the entitlements for user

AttributeDefinition.Description: Last modification date of the login

AttributeDefinition.Description: Database users which are associated to the login

AttributeDefinition.Description: Server and database roles assigned to the login and its mapped database users

AttributeDefinition.Description: Native identity represented by default as groupName or groupName@databaseName

AttributeDefinition.name: database_name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Database name in which group exists

AttributeDefinition.name: database_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Database ID in which group exists

AttributeDefinition.name: principal_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Id of server or database principal

AttributeDefinition.name: is_fixed_role
AttributeDefinition.Description: If the value is 1, then this row represents an entry for one of the fixed server or database roles

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles that are member to the group

AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user is subject to the producer code security

AttributeDefinition.Description: The underwriting authority profile's formatted name

AttributeDefinition.Description: The business unit to which the user belongs

AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name of the role

Application.name: Windows Local Template

List.String: Errors returned from IQService. The network path was not found.

AttributeDefinition.name: AutoUnlockInterval
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time interval for auto unlocking of locked user account

AttributeDefinition.name: Disabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag to indicate if the user is disabled.

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups assigned to a user

AttributeDefinition.name: HomeDirectory
AttributeDefinition.Description: Location of the user's home directory

AttributeDefinition.name: Lockedout
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag to indicate a user is locked out

AttributeDefinition.name: MaxStorage
AttributeDefinition.Description: The maximum amount of disk space the user can use.

AttributeDefinition.name: MinPasswordLength
AttributeDefinition.Description: Minimum length of the user's password

AttributeDefinition.name: Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the account unqualified SAMAccountName

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordAge
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time duration of the password in use. This property indicates the number of seconds that have elapsed since the password was last changed.

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordExpired
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the password is expired

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordNotRequired
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag to indicate if the user requires a password.

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordUnchangeable
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag to indicate if the user password can be changed.

AttributeDefinition.name: PrimaryGroupID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Id of the user's primary group.

AttributeDefinition.name: sAMAccountName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Fully qualified version of the sAMAccountName

AttributeDefinition.name: BadPasswordAttempts
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of consecutive Bad Password Attempts made last time

AttributeDefinition.name: LoginScript
AttributeDefinition.Description: File path of Login script file

AttributeDefinition.name: HomeDirDrive
AttributeDefinition.Description: Home Directory Drive of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordNeverExpires
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag to indicate if the password never expires.

AttributeDefinition.name: MaxPasswordAge
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the maximum time interval, in seconds, after which the password must be changed.

AttributeDefinition.name: MinPasswordAge
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the minimum time interval, in seconds, before the password can be changed.

AttributeDefinition.name: LastLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time when user logged in last time

AttributeDefinition.name: MemberGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups assigned to a group

AttributeDefinition.name: Members
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of users assigned to a group

AttributeDefinition.name: sAMAccountName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Fully qualified version of the sAMAccountName

All rights reserved. --> <Form xmlns="http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd" name="Windows Local" connectorName="Windows Local - Direct" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released" shortDesc="ShortDesc"> <Menu name="Attributes" label="attributes"> <Section name="Attributes" label="attributes" type="api" method="get" url="/rest/applications/settings/attributeConfig" paramsAllowed="appId,appType" /> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: SAP Concur

AttributeDefinition.name: Id
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Country
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's Country, expressed as a two-letter country code

AttributeDefinition.name: Postal Code
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's ZIP or postal code

AttributeDefinition.name: Entitlements
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's entitlements or modules assignments

AttributeDefinition.name: Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Groups linked to the user through role assignments

AttributeDefinition.name: Reimbursement Currency
AttributeDefinition.Description: Three-digit currency code in the list of system reimbursement currencies

AttributeDefinition.name: Country/Region of Residence
AttributeDefinition.Description: Two-letter country code of Expense Country

AttributeDefinition.name: Default Language
AttributeDefinition.Description: Locale from the list of configured locales as defined in [RFC5646]. Example: en-US

AttributeDefinition.name: Cash Advance Account Code
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's cash advance account code

AttributeDefinition.name: Is Test Employee
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user is a test employee

AttributeDefinition.name: Role Code
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the role

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <!-- Copyright (C) 2021 SailPoint Technologies, Inc. All rights reserved. -->
<Form xmlns='http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd' name='SAP Concur' connectorName="SAP Concur" shortDesc="ShortDesc" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released" fileUpload="false">
<Menu name="SAP Concur Settings" label="con_form_sap_concur_config_title"> <Section name="SAP Concur Settings" label="con_form_sap_concur_config_title" sectionInfo="con_form_sap_concur_config_title" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_AuthenticationSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/concur/help/"> <Field name="host" displayName="con_form_sap_concur_base_url" type="url" required="true" placeHolder="placeHolder_host" helpKey="con_help_sap_concur_base_url" />
<Field name="grant_type" displayName="con_form_sap_concur_grant_type" type="select" defaultValue="REFRESH_TOKEN" readOnly="true" helpKey="help_con_sap_concur_grant_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option label="con_form_sap_concur_grant_type_refresh_token" value="REFRESH_TOKEN"/> </AllowedValues> </Field>
<Field name="companyId" displayName="con_form_sap_concur_company_id" type="text" helpKey="help_con_sap_concur_company_id" required="true" />
<!-- Fields for grant_type 'Refresh_Token' --> <Field name="client_id" displayName="con_form_sap_concur_client_id" type="text" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="REFRESH_TOKEN" helpKey="help_con_sap_concur_client_id"/> <Field name="client_secret" displayName="con_form_sap_concur_client_secret" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="REFRESH_TOKEN" helpKey="help_con_sap_concur_client_secret"/> <Field name="refresh_token" displayName="con_form_sap_concur_grant_type_refresh_token" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="REFRESH_TOKEN" helpKey="help_con_sap_concur_refresh_token"/>
<Field name="aggregateInactiveUsers" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_sap_concur_include_inactive_users" helpKey="help_con_sap_concur_include_inactive_users"/> <Field name="pageSize" displayName="con_form_sap_concur_page_size" type="number" defaultValue="50" min="10" max="100" helKey="help.help_con_sap_concur_page_size" saveAsString="true"/> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: SAP Identity Directory

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: External ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: An Identifier for the user as defined by the provisioning client.

AttributeDefinition.name: Active
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean value indicating the Users administrative status.

AttributeDefinition.name: User Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user name used by the user to directly authenticate to the service provider.

AttributeDefinition.name: User Type
AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of user used to identify the relationship between the organization and the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: First Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages.

AttributeDefinition.name: Last Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages.

AttributeDefinition.name: Middle Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The middle name of the User.

AttributeDefinition.name: Salutation
AttributeDefinition.Description: A formal title used before the user's name.

AttributeDefinition.name: Display Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the User, suitable for display to end-users.

AttributeDefinition.name: Title
AttributeDefinition.Description: The users title, such as Vice President.

AttributeDefinition.name: Language
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's preferred written or spoken language.

AttributeDefinition.name: Timezone
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Users time zone in the Olson time zone database format, e.g., America/Los_Angeles.

AttributeDefinition.name: Phone
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's primary work phone number.

AttributeDefinition.name: Postal Code
AttributeDefinition.Description: Postal code used in street address.

AttributeDefinition.name: Employee Number
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Numeric or alphanumeric identifier assigned to a person, typically based on order of hire or association with an organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: Relationship
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's association with the organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: Corporate Group
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of user's corporate groups.

AttributeDefinition.name: Is Email Verified?
AttributeDefinition.Description: A boolean value indicating user email vefification status.

AttributeDefinition.name: Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of groups to which the user belongs.

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the profile

AttributeDefinition.name: status
AttributeDefinition.Description: The active status of the profile

AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the profile is a non-employee or an assignment.

<Field name="useSSL" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_ldap_use_ssl" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_use_ssl"/> <Field name="authorizationType" type="select" defaultValue="simple" displayName="con_form_ldap_auth_type" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_auth_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="simple" label="con_form_ldap_auth_type_simple"/> <Option value="none" label="con_form_ldap_auth_type_none"/> </AllowedValues> </Field>
<Field name="user" displayName="con_form_ldap_user" type="text" required="true" placeHolder="cn=admin,dc=example,dc=com" parentKey="authorizationType" parentValue="none" readOnly="true" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_user" /> <Field name="password" type="secret" displayName="con_form_ldap_password" parentKey="authorizationType" parentValue="none" readOnly="true" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_password"/>
<Field name="host" type="text" required="true" placeHolder="host.example.com" displayName="con_form_ldap_host" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_host"/> <Field name="port" type="number" required="true" defaultValue="389" displayName="con_form_ldap_port" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_port"/> <Field name="pageSize" type="number" defaultValue="100" displayName="con_form_ldap_page_size" min="1" saveAsString="true" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_page_size"/>
<Field name="authSearchAttributes" type="textarea" displayName="con_form_ldap_auth_srch_atts" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_auth_srch_atts" defaultValue="cn,uid,mail"/>

<Field name="searchDNs" type="fieldsArray">
<Field name="searchScope" type="select" defaultValue="SUBTREE" displayName="searchScope" required="true"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="SUBTREE" label="subtreeScope"/> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="searchDN" type="text" required="true" placeHolder="ou=people,dc=example,dc=com" displayName="con_form_ldap_search_dn" maxlength="99999"/> <Field name="iterateSearchFilter" type="text" displayName="con_form_AD_iterate_search_filter" placeHolder="placeHolder_iterateSearchFilter" maxlength="99999"/>
</Field>
</Section>
<Section name ="groupSettings" label="con_form_ldap_group_search_scope" sectionInfo="con_form_ldap_group_search_scope" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_ConnectionCredentials" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/openldap/help/">
<Field name="group.searchDNs" type="fieldsArray"> <Field name="searchScope" type="select" defaultValue="SUBTREE" displayName="searchScope" required="true"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="SUBTREE" label="subtreeScope"/> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="objectType" type="select" defaultValue="SUBTREE" displayName="con_form_ldap_objectType"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="SUBTREE" label="subtreeScope"/> <Option value="OBJECT_SCOPE" label="objectScope"/> <Option value="ONELEVEL_SCOPE" label="oneLevelScope"/> </AllowedValues> </Field>
<Field name="searchDN" type="text" displayName="con_form_ldap_search_dn" maxlength="99999"/> <Field name="iterateSearchFilter" type="text" displayName="con_form_AD_iterate_search_filter" maxlength="99999"/> </Field>
</Section>
</Menu> </Form>

Application.featuresString: DISCOVER_SCHEMA, PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, UNLOCK, ENABLE, SEARCH, AUTHENTICATE, PASSWORD, CURRENT_PASSWORD
Application.name: Okta

AttributeDefinition.name: email
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary email address of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: secondEmail
AttributeDefinition.Description: Secondary email address of user typically used for account recovery

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the user, suitable for display to end users

AttributeDefinition.name: nickName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Casual way to address the user in real life

AttributeDefinition.name: honorificPrefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: Honorific prefix(es) of the user, or title in most Western languages

AttributeDefinition.name: profileUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: URL of user's online profile (e.g. a web page)

AttributeDefinition.name: primaryPhone
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary phone number of user such as home number

AttributeDefinition.name: streetAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Full street address component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: city
AttributeDefinition.Description: City or locality component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: state
AttributeDefinition.Description: State or region component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: zipCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: Zip code or postal code component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: countryCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: Country name component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: postalAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Mailing address component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: User's preferred written or spoken languages

AttributeDefinition.name: locale
AttributeDefinition.Description: User's default location for purposes of localizing items such as currency, date time format, numerical representations etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: userType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Used to identify the organization to user relationship such as "Employee" or "Contractor"

AttributeDefinition.name: employeeNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: Organization or company assigned unique identifier for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: costCenter
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of cost center assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: manager
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name of the user's manager

AttributeDefinition.name: status
AttributeDefinition.Description: Status of the user. e.g. ACTIVE, PROVISIONED, DEPROVISIONED etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: activated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when transition to ACTIVE status completed

AttributeDefinition.name: lastUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when user was last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: passwordChanged
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when password was last changed

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Administrator roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: lastMembershipUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when group's memberships were last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: type
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines how a group's profile and memberships are managed

AttributeDefinition.name: lastUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when group's profile was last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: label
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique user-defined display name for application

AttributeDefinition.name: lastUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when application was last updated

<Field name="host" displayName="con_okta_api_host_name" type="url" required="true" helpKey="help_con_okta_host"/> <Field name="authtype" displayName="con_form_okta_auth_type" type="select" defaultValue="API Token" helpKey="help_con_okta_auth_type" > <AllowedValues> <Option label="con_okta_api_token" value="API Token"/> <Option label="con_form_okta_oauth2" value="OAuth2"/> </AllowedValues> </Field>

helpKey="help_con_okta_scope" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="OAuth2"/> <Field name="jwtHeader" displayName="con_form_okta_jwt_header" type="textarea" required="true" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_okta_jwt_header"/> <Field name="audience" displayName="con_form_okta_audience" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_okta_audience" /> <Field name="issuer" displayName="con_form_okta_issuer" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_okta_issuer" /> <Field name="subject" displayName="con_form_okta_subject" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_okta_subject" /> <Field name="private_key" valueHidden="true" displayName="con_form_okta_privateKey" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_okta_private_key" /> <Field name="private_key_password" displayName="con_form_okta_pvt_key_psw" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="authtype" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_okta_pvt_key_psw" /> <Field name="pageSize" displayName="con_form_okta_page_size" type="number" min="1" max="200" defaultValue="200" helpKey="help_con_okta_page_size" saveAsString="true" /> </Section> </Menu> <Menu name="Aggregation Filter Settings" label="con_form_okta_agg_filter_label"> <Section name="Aggregation Filter Settings" label="con_form_okta_agg_filter_label"> <Field name="accountAggFilter" displayName="con_form_okta_account_agg_filter" type="text" helpKey="help_con_okta_account_agg_constraint" /> <Field name="groupAggFilter" displayName="con_form_okta_group_agg_filter" type="text" helpKey="help_con_okta_group_agg_constraint" defaultValue="type eq "BUILT_IN" or type eq "OKTA_GROUP"" /> <Field name="applicationAggFilter" displayName="con_form_okta_app_agg_filter" type="text" helpKey="help_con_okta_app_agg_constraint" /> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.featuresString: AUTHENTICATE, MANAGER_LOOKUP, SEARCH, PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, ENABLE, UNLOCK, PASSWORD
Application.name: LDAP Template

AttributeDefinition.name: cn
AttributeDefinition.Description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: dn
AttributeDefinition.Description: distinguished name for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: departmentNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: identifies a department within an organization

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: preferred name to be used when displaying entries

AttributeDefinition.name: employeeNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: numerically identifies an employee within an organization

AttributeDefinition.name: employeeType
AttributeDefinition.Description: type of employment for a person

AttributeDefinition.name: givenName
AttributeDefinition.Description: first name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups a user is a member

AttributeDefinition.name: initials
AttributeDefinition.Description: initials of some or all of names, but not the surname(s).

AttributeDefinition.name: ou
AttributeDefinition.Description: organizational unit this object belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: preferred written or spoken language for a person

AttributeDefinition.name: sn
AttributeDefinition.Description: last (family) name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: st
AttributeDefinition.Description: state or province which this object resides in

AttributeDefinition.name: cn
AttributeDefinition.Description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: ou
AttributeDefinition.Description: organizational unit this object belongs to
