Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, SEARCH, UNSTRUCTURED_TARGETS, UNLOCK, ENABLE, PASSWORD
Application.name: ACF2

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups this user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.ASSIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Max address space size - OMVS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.CPUTIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Max cputime for a dubbed process - OMVS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.FILEPROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Max files per process - OMVS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.HOME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Home-directory - defines the pathname of the initial directory used when a user enters the OMVS command or enters the ISPF shell - OMVS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.MEMLIMIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of bytes of non-shared memory space that can be allocated by the user

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.SHMEMMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of bytes of shared memory space that can be allocated by the user

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.OMVSPGM
AttributeDefinition.Description: OMVS shell program started when the OMVS command is entered or when an OMVS batch job is started using the BPXBATCH program - OMVS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.PROCUSER
AttributeDefinition.Description: Max number of processes - OMVS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.THREADS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Max number of pthread created threads - OMVS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.TIMEOUT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Idle time value - CICS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.FORCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user is signed off (FORCE) or not signed off (NOFORCE) when an XRF takeover occurs. - CICS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.OPCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Operator class values - CICS user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.AUTOLOG
AttributeDefinition.Description: User should be automatically signed on to OMVS DCE - DCE user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.HOMEUUID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Home cell UUID - DCE user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.HOMECELL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Home cell name- DCE user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.DCENAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Principal name of the user - DCE user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: KERB.MAXTKTLF
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum ticket life in seconds - KERB user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: KERB.KERB_VIO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of Kerberos key violations for user

AttributeDefinition.name: KERB.DES
AttributeDefinition.Description: DES encryption type is set for this logonid - KERB user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: KERB.DES3
AttributeDefinition.Description: DES3 encryption type is set for this logonid - KERB user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: KERB.DESD
AttributeDefinition.Description: DESD encryption type is set for this logonid - KERB user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LANGUAGE.PRIMARY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Three-character language code for the primary language of user - LANGUAGE user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LANGUAGE.SECONDRY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Three-character language code for the secondary language of user - LANGUAGE user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.STORAGE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Amount of storage in MB to be used for message queuing - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.AUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority level to issue console commands (MASTER,ALL,SYSTEM,IO,CONSOLE,INFO) - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.AUTO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether to receive unsolicited messages - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MONITOR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Options when monitoring jobs, TSO users or data set status (JOBNAMES,TSOSESS,TSOTIME,STATUS) - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.ROUTCODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: routing codes or ranges associated with this console session - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.LOGCMD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether command responses are to be logged in the hard copy log - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MIGID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a one-byte migration ID is to be assigned to this console - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.UD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether undelivered messages are to be received - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.CMDSYS
AttributeDefinition.Description: System name to which commands issued from this console are to be sent - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.ALTGROUP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Console group to be used in recovery - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.OPERMSCP
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of system names from which this console can receive messages that are not directed to a specific console - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MSGLEVEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Messages to be received by this console (OPER REPLY,IMMEDIATE, CRITICAL EVENTUAL, EVENTUAL, INFO, NO BROADCAST, ALL) - OPERPARM user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.IC
AttributeDefinition.Description: The initial command to be executed when the user signs on - NETVIEW user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.CONSNAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default zOS console identifier - NETVIEW user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.SECCTL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security check indicator - NETVIEW user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.MSGRECVR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user can receive unsolicited messages - NETVIEW user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.NGMFADMN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user has administrative authority to the Graphic Monitor Facility - NETVIEW user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.NTVCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of scope classes - NETVIEW user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.DOMAINS
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of program identifiers in another domain to which the user has authority - NETVIEW user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: TSORGN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default TSO region size in kilobytes

AttributeDefinition.name: REVOKE_TYPE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Revoke type (SUSPEND, CANCEL, Both) of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: UID
AttributeDefinition.Description: UID pseudo field, concatenation of selected logonid fields

AttributeDefinition.name: GROUP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default group name for a logonid

AttributeDefinition.name: SEC_VIO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of cumulative security violations for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: UPD_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time that this logonid record was last updated (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: HOMENODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Node name where this logonid record is stored in a Logonid database in a distributed database network (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: MONITOR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a message is sent to the security console and to a designated person each time this user enters the system

AttributeDefinition.name: TRACE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether CA ACF2 creates SMF loggings for all data set and resource access attempts made by this user

AttributeDefinition.name: MON_LOG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether an SMF record is written (for the Invalid Password - Authority Log, ACFRPTPW) each time this user enters the system

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO_TRC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether CA ACF2 traces all TSO commands issued by this user for the Command Statistics Report (ACFRPTCR)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACTIVE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Activates the logonid one minute after midnight on the date contained in this field

AttributeDefinition.name: EXPIRE
AttributeDefinition.Description: When the privileges for this logonid will expire

AttributeDefinition.name: CSDATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date that the CANCEL, SUSPEND, MON-LOG, or MONITOR field was set for this user (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: CSWHO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid of the user who set the CANCEL, SUSPEND, MON-LOG, or MONITOR field for this user (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACCOUNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can insert, list, change, and delete logonid records

AttributeDefinition.name: LEADER
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can display and alter certain fields of logonid records for other users.

AttributeDefinition.name: AUDIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can display the records and parameters of the CA ACF2 system.

AttributeDefinition.name: CONSULT
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can display other logonid records

AttributeDefinition.name: REFRESH
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can issue the /F ACF2,REFRESH operator command to update GSO

AttributeDefinition.name: READALL
AttributeDefinition.Description: User has read and execute access to all data sets at the site

AttributeDefinition.name: PROGRAM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Program (name or mask) must be used to submit jobs for this logonid

AttributeDefinition.name: SCPLIST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope record that restricts accesses for this privileged user

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can log on to TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: JOB
AttributeDefinition.Description: Batch or background jobs can use this logonid

AttributeDefinition.name: STC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid is for use by started tasks only

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can sign on to CICS

AttributeDefinition.name: IMS
AttributeDefinition.Description: user can sign on to IMS

AttributeDefinition.name: BDT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Address space for this logonid belongs to the Bulk Data Transfer (BDT) product

AttributeDefinition.name: TAPE_BLP
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can use full bypass label processing (BLP) when accessing tape data sets

AttributeDefinition.name: TAPE_LBL
AttributeDefinition.Description: User has limited bypass label processing authority when using tapes

AttributeDefinition.name: SUBAUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: Jobs that specify this logonid can be submitted only through APF-authorized programs

AttributeDefinition.name: LOGSHIFT
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can access the system outside of the time period specified in the SHIFT field of the logonid record

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTODUMP
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 takes an SVC dump whenever a data set or resource violation occurs

AttributeDefinition.name: DUMPAUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can generate a dump, even in an execute-only environment

AttributeDefinition.name: RESTRICT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid is for production use only. A restricted logonid does not require a password for user verification

AttributeDefinition.name: RULEVLD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Access rule must authorize any data set accesses that a user makes

AttributeDefinition.name: NO_STORE
AttributeDefinition.Description: User cannot store or delete rule sets

AttributeDefinition.name: NO_INH
AttributeDefinition.Description: Network job cannot inherit this logonid from its submitter

AttributeDefinition.name: MAINT
AttributeDefinition.Description: A logonid can access data sets without CA ACF2 rule validation or loggings by means of a specified program executed from a specified library

AttributeDefinition.name: NON_CNCL
AttributeDefinition.Description: A user with the NON-CNCL privilege defined in their logonid record has full access to any data set or resource despite any security violations that can occur during the access attempt

AttributeDefinition.name: PPGM
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can execute the protected programs specified in the GSO PPGM record

AttributeDefinition.name: SYNCNODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the node where the synchronized logonid for a user resides. This node name is the logical node name as defined by a NETNODE record.

AttributeDefinition.name: CMD_PROP
AttributeDefinition.Description: user can use the SET TARGET command or the TARGET parameter on the INSERT, CHANGE, LIST, and DELETE commands to override the global CPF target list

AttributeDefinition.name: ACC_CNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: System accesses counter made by this logonid since it was created (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACC_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date of the last system access by this user (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACC_SRCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logical or physical input source name or source group name from which this user last accessed the system. (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACC_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time of the last system access by this user (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time when a password was last changed

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_DAT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date of the last invalid password or password phrase attempt (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_TIM
AttributeDefinition.Description: last time a user entered an invalid password (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_SRC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logical or physical input source name or source group name from which a user last entered an invalid password (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_INV
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of password violations that occurred since the last successful logon (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_VIO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of password violations that occurred on PSWD_DAT

AttributeDefinition.name: MAXDAYS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of days permitted between password changes before the password expires

AttributeDefinition.name: MINDAYS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Minimum number of days that must elapse before a user can change their password

AttributeDefinition.name: DFT_DEST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default remote destination for TSO-spun SYSOUT data sets

AttributeDefinition.name: DFT_PFX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default TSO prefix that is set in the user profile at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_ACCT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify an account number at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: PMT_ACCT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 requires a user to specify an account number at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_PROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify the TSO procedure name at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: PMT_PROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 requires a user to specify a TSO procedure name at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_RCVR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to use the recover option of the TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_SIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: User is authorized to specify any region size at logon time (overriding TSOSIZE)

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify the TSO session time limit at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_UNIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify the TSO unit name at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_DEST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify a remote output destination at TSO logon that overrides the value specified in the DFT-DEST field

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_MSG
AttributeDefinition.Description: User has permission to specify a message class at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_PERF
AttributeDefinition.Description: permission to specify a performance group at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: MODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: User wants to receive modal messages from TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: CONSOLE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permits user to access the TSO CONSOLE facility

AttributeDefinition.name: PAUSE
AttributeDefinition.Description: User wants a program to pause when a multilevel message is issued by a command executed in a CLIST

AttributeDefinition.name: PROMPT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 prompts a user for missing or incorrect parameters

AttributeDefinition.name: MOUNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to issue mounts for devices

AttributeDefinition.name: RECOVER
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can specify the recover option of the TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOCMDS
AttributeDefinition.Description: TSO command list module name that contains the list of commands that this user is authorized to use

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOFSCRN
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can use the full-screen logon display

AttributeDefinition.name: TSORBA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Mail Index Record Pointer (MIRP) for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOTIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default TSO time parameter, which is the CPU time limit (in minutes) associated with the TSO session

AttributeDefinition.name: INTERCOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: User is willing to accept messages from other users through the TSO SEND command

AttributeDefinition.name: JCL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the ability to submit batch jobs from TSO and to use SUBMIT, STATUS, CANCEL, and OUTPUT commands

AttributeDefinition.name: MAIL
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can receive mail messages from TSO at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: NOTICES
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can receive TSO notices at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: CHAR
AttributeDefinition.Description: TSO character-delete character for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: ATTR2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables a site to do TSO command limiting when you use SYS1.UADS instead of the Logonid database

AttributeDefinition.name: CMD_LONG
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 should bypass the TSO command list feature for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: VLD_ACCT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 validates the TSO account number of a user

AttributeDefinition.name: VLD_PROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 validates the TSO procedure name of a user

AttributeDefinition.name: MSGID
AttributeDefinition.Description: User wants TSO messages to have message IDs prefixed

AttributeDefinition.name: ALLCMDS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the ability to bypass the CA ACF2 restricted command lists by entering a special prefix character

AttributeDefinition.name: ACF2CICS
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 CICS security is to be initialized in any CICS region running with this address space logonid

AttributeDefinition.name: IDLE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum time permitted (in minutes) between terminal transactions for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: MUSDLID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default logonid for a multiple-user single address space system (MUSASS) address space

AttributeDefinition.name: MUSUPDT
AttributeDefinition.Description: A MUSASS logonid with this privilege has the authority to make calls on behalf of users who are updating the databases

AttributeDefinition.name: SOURCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logical or physical input source name or source group name from which a user must access the system

AttributeDefinition.name: SHIFT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Shift record name that defines the period during which a user can log on to the system

AttributeDefinition.name: ZONE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Zone record name that defines the time zone from which this logonid normally accesses the system

AttributeDefinition.name: PREFIX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prefix key of the rule used to validate access to a data set

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP4
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP5
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP6
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP7
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP8
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: SMSINFO
AttributeDefinition.Description: CONTROL(SMS) record name that contains the default storage management class values for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: RSRCVLD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Resource rule must authorize any resource accesses that a user makes

AttributeDefinition.name: PRIV_CTL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid is valid for dynamic logonid privileges

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_UPP
AttributeDefinition.Description: New password is to be upper-case

AttributeDefinition.name: LDS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether logonid administrative changes for this user were propagated to all active Lightweight-Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) servers in the network

AttributeDefinition.name: MUSASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid is for a multiple-user single address space system, such as CICS or IMS

AttributeDefinition.name: MUSIDINF
AttributeDefinition.Description: MUSID field should be used to restrict access to a MUSASS region for CA ACF2 Info type system entry calls

AttributeDefinition.name: NOMAXVIO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevents the user violation counter from incrementing and MAXVIO processing from occurring

AttributeDefinition.name: NO_OMVS
AttributeDefinition.Description: User cannot use any z/OS UNIX System Services

AttributeDefinition.name: NO_STATS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last access statistics on a successful full validation (ACVAMVAL) MUSASS signon request are bypassed

AttributeDefinition.name: PP_TRC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether CA ACF2 creates SMF loggings that contain the Active Library List for all data set access attempts made by this logonid in a batch job

AttributeDefinition.name: PP_TRCV
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether CA ACF2 creates SMF loggings that contain the Active Library List for all data set access violations made by this logonid in a batch job

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_XTR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password for the logonid is halfway encrypted and can be extracted by an APF-authorized program

AttributeDefinition.name: PTICKET
AttributeDefinition.Description: Passticket can be used with a userid that has the RESTRICT attribute

AttributeDefinition.name: SYSPEXCL
AttributeDefinition.Description: When the system is active in a sysplex enivronment, this logonid record should not be written to the structure

AttributeDefinition.name: TDISKVLD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Access rules must exist for all data on temporary disks that this user accesses

AttributeDefinition.name: UNICNTR
AttributeDefinition.Description: User also resides on the CA Common Services (CCS) platform

AttributeDefinition.name: VLDRSTCT
AttributeDefinition.Description: PROGRAM and SUBAUTH are to be validated even when this RESTRICTed logonid is inherited

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDDN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Distinguished name (DN) which will be used in conjunction with the BIND password if the LDAP Server needs to supply an administrator or user identity to BIND with another LDAP server - PROXY user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDPTOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time the BINDPW field was last changed - PROXY user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDPW
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password for the DN defined in the BINDDN parameter - PROXY user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.LDAPHOST
AttributeDefinition.Description: URL of the LDAP server that the zOS LDAP Server will contact when acting as a proxy on behalf of a requester - PROXY user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.AUTOUIDL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Automatically assigns a LINUXUID value when there is an active GSO AUTOIDLX record that specifies ASSIGNU - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.LINUXGRP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the LINUX group profile record - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.LINUXHOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Pathname of the Initial Directory when a user enters a Linux command or the ISPF shell - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.LINUXNAM
AttributeDefinition.Description: LINUX Application User Identity - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.LINUXPGM
AttributeDefinition.Description: LINUX Service Shell Program when Linux command is first entered - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: KEYRING.DEFAULT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Record key of a CERTDATA certificate record that is to be used as the default certificate for this key ring

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.ACTIVE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when the profile record associating the user to the certificate becomes active - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.CERTID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Serial number and certification authority's distinguished name as extracted from the certificate - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.DSA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Key pair has been generated using the Digital Signature Algorithm instead of the RSA algorithm - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.DSN
AttributeDefinition.Description: zOS data set that contains the digital certificate that is inserted into a CERTDATA profile record - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.EXPIRE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date which gives the security administrator the ability to specify when the profile record associating the user to the certificate expires - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.HITRUST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Certificate is both highly trusted and trusted - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.ICSF
AttributeDefinition.Description: Private key for the certificate is placed in ICSF - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.LABEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Label to be associated with the certificate - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.PCICC
AttributeDefinition.Description: PCICC was specified on the GENCERT or INSERT command - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.SUBJDN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Subject distinguished name as extracted from the certificate - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.TRUST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Certificate is trusted - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: KERBLINK.KBLKNAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Userid that is to be associated with the foreign principal - KERBLINK user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PASSWORD.@PSWDCNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of previous passwords stored in the record for extended password history - PASSWORD user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PASSWORD.@PWD_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time of the user current password - PASSWORD user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CRE_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time that a logonid record was created (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PWP_VIO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of password phrase violations that occurred on PSWD-DAT

AttributeDefinition.name: PWPHRASE.PWP_EXP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password phrase has been manually expired

AttributeDefinition.name: PWPHRASE.PWP_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time when a password phrase was last changed

AttributeDefinition.name: Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Roles to which this user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: RoleGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Role groups to which this user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: AccountRoleDirectPermissions
AttributeDefinition.Description: The direct permissions for account obtained from ROLESET rules

AttributeDefinition.name: AccountRoleIndirectPermissions
AttributeDefinition.Description: The indirect permissions for account obtained through role membership

AttributeDefinition.name: UIDMASKS
AttributeDefinition.Description: UID mask which defines this Group. (All users matching this UID mask belong to this group)

AttributeDefinition.name: IncludeList
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of users included in the Role

AttributeDefinition.name: ExcludeList
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of users excluded from the Role. This is subset of values from IncludeList

<Menu name="SCIM Settings" label="con_form_scim_config_title"> <Section name="SCIM Settings" label="con_form_scim_config_title"> <Field name="host" displayName="con_form_scim_base_url" required="true" type="text" helpKey="con_help_scim_base_url" /> <Field name="authType" displayName="con_form_scim_auth_type" type="radio" defaultValue="oauth2" helpKey="con_help_scim_auth_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option label="con_form_scim_auth_type_oauth" value="oauth2" /> <Option label="con_form_scim_auth_type_api_token" value="apiToken" /> <Option label="con_form_scim_auth_type_basic" value="basic" /> </AllowedValues> </Field>
<!-- authType - oauth2 --> <Field name="grant_type" displayName="con_form_scim_grant_type" type="select" defaultValue="CLIENT_CREDENTIALS" parentKey="authType" parentValue="oauth2" helpKey="help_con_SCIM_grant_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option label="con_form_scim_grant_type_client_credentials" value="CLIENT_CREDENTIALS" /> <Option label="con_form_scim_grant_type_refresh_token" value="REFRESH_TOKEN" /> <Option label="con_form_scim_grant_type_jwt" value="JWT_BEARER" /> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="client_id" displayName="con_form_scim_client_id" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authType" parentValue="oauth2" helpKey="help_con_SCIM_client_id" /> <Field name="client_secret" displayName="con_form_scim_client_secret" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="authType" parentValue="oauth2" helpKey="help_con_SCIM_client_secret" /> <Field name="token_url" displayName="con_form_scim_token_host" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authType" parentValue="oauth2" helpKey="help_con_SCIM_oauth_host" />
<!-- grant type - refresh token --> <Field name="refresh_token" displayName="con_form_scim_grant_type_refresh_token" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="REFRESH_TOKEN" helpKey="help_con_SCIM_refresh_token" />
<!-- grant type - jwt --> <Field name="private_key" valueHidden="true" displayName="con_form_scim_jwt_pvt_key" type="text" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="JWT_BEARER" helpKey="help_con_form_jwt_private_key" /> <Field name="private_key_password" displayName="con_form_scim_jwt_pvt_key_pwd" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="grant_type" parentValue="JWT_BEARER" helpKey="help_con_form_jwt_private_key_password" />
<!-- authType - api token --> <Field name="apiToken" displayName="con_form_scim_auth_type_api_token" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="authType" parentValue="apiToken" helpKey="con_help_scim_api_token" />
<!-- authType - basic --> <Field name="user" displayName="con_form_scim_username" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authType" parentValue="basic" helpKey="con_help_scim_username" /> <Field name="password" displayName="con_form_scim_password" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="authType" parentValue="basic" helpKey="con_help_scim_password" />
<Field name="pageSize" displayName="con_form_scim_page_size" type="number" helpKey="help_con_SCIM_page_size" /> <Field name="contentType" displayName="con_form_scim_content_type" type="select" defaultValue="json" helpKey="con_help_scim_content_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option label="con_form_scim_content_type_json" value="json" /> <Option label="con_form_scim_content_type_xml" value="xml" /> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="accountFilterString" displayName="con_form_SCIM_filter_attribute_account" type="text" helpKey="help_con_SCIM_filter_attribute_account"/> <Field name="groupFilterString" displayName="con_form_SCIM_filter_attribute_group" type="text" helpKey="help_con_SCIM_filter_attribute_group"/> </Section> </Menu>
</Form>

Application.name: AWS IAM Identity Center

AttributeDefinition.name: UserId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique ID of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: DisplayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: A user-friendly display name for the user, is often used in interfaces where a readable name is preferred over technical identifiers.

AttributeDefinition.name: External ID List
AttributeDefinition.Description: External ID List of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The friendly name of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: AccountType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether the account is Federated, Local Federated, or Local, indicating the method of user authentication.

AttributeDefinition.name: Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of groups to which the user belongs, indicating their roles or organisational membership.

AttributeDefinition.name: AccountPermissionSet
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of accounts assigned to the user through Identity Center Permission Sets, reflecting the user's permissions and access rights.

AttributeDefinition.name: GroupId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Unique Identifier for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: GroupName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: AccountPermissionSet
AttributeDefinition.Description: Accounts and Permission Sets assigned to this group

AttributeDefinition.name: DisplayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Display Name of the Permission Set

AttributeDefinition.name: AccountPermissionSetId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique Id for the Permission Set

<!-- IAM User Credentials section --> <Field name="kid" displayName="con_form_AWSIdentityCenter_keyID" type="text" required="true" parentKey="authMethod" parentValue="IAM User" helpKey="help_con_AWSIdentityCenter_key"/> <Field name="secret" displayName="con_form_AWSIdentityCenter_SecretKey" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="authMethod" parentValue="IAM User" helpKey="help_con_AWSIdentityCenter_secretkey"/> <Field name="roleName" displayName="con_form_new_AWSIdentityCenter_Config_Role_Name" type="text" parentKey="authMethod" parentValue="IAM User" helpKey="help_con_form_AWSIdentityCenter_Config_Role_Name"/>

AttributeDefinition.name: User_Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user name of the workday account.

AttributeDefinition.name: First_Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The first name of the ttudent

AttributeDefinition.name: Last_Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last name of the ttudent

AttributeDefinition.name: Full_Legal_Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The full legal name of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Legal_Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The legal name for a ttudent

AttributeDefinition.name: Prefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The prefix of the student's legal name.

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_Home
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary home address of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Email_Address_Home
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary home email address of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Address_Work
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary work address of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Student_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The student ID of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Universal_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The universal ID of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Academic_Unit
AttributeDefinition.Description: The academic unit of the application for this student prospect record.

AttributeDefinition.name: Home_Mobile
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary home phone number of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Email_Address_Work
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary work email address of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Work_Mobile
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary home phone number of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Additional_Email_Address_Home
AttributeDefinition.Description: The additional home email address of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Additional_Email_Address_Work
AttributeDefinition.Description: The additional work email address of the student.

AttributeDefinition.name: Student_Program_of_Study_Record_Status
AttributeDefinition.Description: The program of study record status of student.

Application.name: Dynamics 365 FO

AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique Id of the company to which the User belongs to

AttributeDefinition.Description: Automatically assigned OrganizationRoles to the User

AttributeDefinition.name: securityRoleIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier for the Security Role

AttributeDefinition.name: legalEntityId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier of the Legal Entity

AttributeDefinition.name: roleDescription
AttributeDefinition.Description: Describes the Security Role function briefly

AttributeDefinition.name: securityRoleUserLicenseType
AttributeDefinition.Description: License type required by the User for the Security Role

AttributeDefinition.name: securityRoleAccessToSensitiveData
AttributeDefinition.Description: Suggests if the security role provides access to the sensitive data

AttributeDefinition.name: securityRoleContextString
AttributeDefinition.Description: Displays the context string applied to the security role

Application.name: Dropbox

AttributeDefinition.name: status
AttributeDefinition.Description: Members with only Active status are considered enabled

AttributeDefinition.name: email_verified
AttributeDefinition.Description: Boolean attribute describes whether user's email is verified to be owned by the user

AttributeDefinition.name: role
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles on the Dropbox, it can be admin or member

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups connected to member

AttributeDefinition.name: familiar_name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Locale-dependent name. In the US, a person's familiar name is their given_name, but elsewhere, it could be any combination of a person's given_name and surname

AttributeDefinition.name: display_name
AttributeDefinition.Description: A name that can be used directly to represent the name of a user's Dropbox account

AttributeDefinition.name: abbreviated_name
AttributeDefinition.Description: An abbreviated form of the person's name. Their initials in most locales

AttributeDefinition.name: joined_on
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date and time the user joined as a member of a specific team

AttributeDefinition.name: persistent_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Persistent ID that a team can attach to the user. The persistent ID is unique ID to be used for SAML authentication

AttributeDefinition.name: group_external_id
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is an arbitrary ID that an admin can attach to a group

AttributeDefinition.name: member_count
AttributeDefinition.Description: Total count of the members connected to the group

AttributeDefinition.name: group_management_type
AttributeDefinition.Description: The group type determines how a group is managed i.e. user_managed/company_managed

Application.Settings:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- Copyright (C) 2021 SailPoint Technologies, Inc. All rights reserved. -->
<Form xmlns='http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd' name='Dropbox' shortDesc="ShortDesc" connectorName="Dropbox" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released" > <Menu name="Dropbox Configuration Settings" label="con_form_dropbox_config_settings"> <Section name="Dropbox Configuration Settings" label="con_form_dropbox_config_settings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_ConnectionSettings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_ConnectionSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/dropbox/help/"> <Field name="host" type="url" required="true" displayName="con_form_dropbox_url" helpKey="help_con_form_Dropbox_url" /> <Field name="appKey" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_dropbox_appkey" helpKey="help_con_form_DropBox_appkey" /> <Field name="appSecret" type="secret" required="true" displayName="con_form_dropbox_appsecret" helpKey="help_con_form_DropBox_appsecret" /> <Field name="refreshToken" type="secret" required="true" displayName="con_form_dropbox_refreshtoken" helpKey="help_con_form_DropBox_refreshtoken" /> <Field name="memberpagesize" type="number" displayName="con_form_dropbox_memberlimit" min="1" max="1000" helpKey="help_con_form_DropBox_pagesize" saveAsString="true"/> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: SAP GRC

AttributeDefinition.name: User Group
AttributeDefinition.Description: User group assigned to a user

AttributeDefinition.name: Valid From
AttributeDefinition.Description: Valid from date of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Valid To
AttributeDefinition.Description: Valid to date of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: System
AttributeDefinition.Description: System ID of the connector/source with highest sequence (priority) maintained in the data source configuration from SPRO.

AttributeDefinition.name: Business Process
AttributeDefinition.Description: Business Process to which role belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: Sub Process
AttributeDefinition.Description: Sub Process to which role belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: Associated Child Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles associated with the Composite or Business role

Application.Settings:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <!-- Copyright (C) 2021 SailPoint Technologies, Inc. All rights reserved. -->
<Form xmlns='http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd' name='SAP GRC' connectorName="SAP GRC" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released" fileUpload="true" shortDesc="ShortDesc">
<BaseConfig> <Field name="fileUpload" maxFiles="5" supportedExtensions=".jar,.so" type="fileupload" maxSize="50" validateJSON="false" /> </BaseConfig> <!-- Connection Settings menu --> <Menu name="connectionSettings" label="menuLabel_connectionSettings"> <Section name="authenticationType" label="sectionLabel_connSettings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_connSettings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_connSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/grc/help/">
<!-- Credentials --> <Field name="grc_user_id" displayName="grcUserId" type="text" required="true" /> <Field name="password" displayName="password" type="secret" required="true" />
<!-- Connection specific parameters --> <Field name="host" displayName="host" type="text" required="true" /> <Field name="systemID" displayName="systemID" type="number" required="true" /> <Field name="clientNumber" displayName="clientNumber" type="number" required="true" /> <Field name="clientLanguage" displayName="clientLanguage" type="text" required="true" defaultValue="EN" /> </Section>
<Section name="sapIAGBridgeConfiguration" label="sectionLabel_iagConfiguration" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_iagConfigInfo" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_iagConfig" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/grc/help/"> <Field name="isSAPIAGBridge" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" displayName="isSAPIAGBridge" /> </Section>
<!-- Webservice URL Configuration section --> <Section name="urlSettings" label="sectionLabel_urlSettings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_urlSettings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_urlConfiguration" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/grc/help/"> <!-- WebService URL's --> <Field name="grc_user_access_url" displayName="grcUserAccessUrl" type="text" required="true" placeHolder="placeHolder_userAccess_url" /> <Field name="grc_request_detail_url" displayName="grcRequestDetailUrl" type="text" required="true" placeHolder="placeHolder_requestDetails_url" /> <Field name="grc_search_roles" displayName="grcSearchRolesUrl" type="text" required="true" placeHolder="placeHolder_searchRole_url" /> <Field name="grc_role_details" displayName="grcRoleDetailsUrl" type="text" required="true" placeHolder="placeHolder_roleDetails_url" /> </Section> <!-- Function Module Configuration section --> <Section name="FunctionModuleConfiguration" label="sectionLabel_functionModuleConfiguration" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_functionModuleConfiguration"> <Field name="spFMName" type="select" defaultValue="RFC_READ_TABLE" displayName="spFMName" required="true"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="/SAILPOIN/SAIL_READ_TABLE" label="/SAILPOIN/SAIL_READ_TABLE"/> <Option value="/SAILPOIN/SAIL_READ_TABLE_LEG" label="/SAILPOIN/SAIL_READ_TABLE_LEG"/> <Option value="RFC_READ_TABLE" label="RFC_READ_TABLE"/> </AllowedValues> </Field> </Section> </Menu>
<!-- Advance Connection Settings --> <Menu name="advanceSettings" label="menuLabel_advance_connectionSettings"> <Section name="sncConfiguration" label="sectionLabel_sncConfiguration" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_sncConfigInfo" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_sncSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/grc/help/"> <Field name="jco.client.snc_mode" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" displayName="enableSNC" /> <Field name="jco.client.snc_qop" displayName="sncSecurityLevel" type="select" defaultValue="8" parentValue="true" parentKey="jco.client.snc_mode" required="true"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="1" label="authenticationOnly" /> <Option value="2" label="integrityProtection" /> <Option value="3" label="privacyProtection" /> <Option value="8" label="defaultProtection" /> <Option value="9" label="maximumProtection" /> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="jco.client.snc_myname" displayName="sncName" type="text" required="true" parentValue="true" parentKey="jco.client.snc_mode" /> <Field name="jco.client.snc_partnername" displayName="sncAppServerName" type="text" required="true" parentValue="true" parentKey="jco.client.snc_mode" /> <Field name="jco.client.snc_lib" displayName="sncLib" type="text" required="true" parentValue="true" parentKey="jco.client.snc_mode" /> </Section> </Menu>
<!-- Aggregation settings menu --> <Menu name="aggregationSettings" label="menuLabel_aggregationSettings"> <!-- Manage AWS Accounts section --> <Section name="aggregationSettings" label="sectionLabel_aggregationFilters" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_aggregationInfo" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_aggregationSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/grc/help/"> <Field name="roleTypeFilter" displayName="roleTypeFilter" type="text" /> <Field name="businessProcessFilter" displayName="businessProcessFilter" type="text" /> <Field name="subProcessFilter" displayName="subProcessFilter" type="text" /> </Section> <!-- Aggregation Delimiter --> <Section name="Aggregation Delimiter Settings" label="sectionLabel_aggregation_delimiter_Settings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_Aggregation_delimiter_Settings"> <Field name="grc_delimiter" displayName="grc_delimiter" type="text" required="false" maxlength="2"/> </Section>
<!-- Function Module Page Size --> <Section name="Page Size Settings" label="sectionLabel_page_Size_Settings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_page_Size_Settings"> <Field name="pagesize" displayName="pagesize" type="number" min="1" max="100000" step="1" required="false" /> </Section> <!-- Account Partition option --> <Section name="accountPartitioningSettings" label="sectionLabel_partitionSettings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_partitionSetting"> <Field name="partitionAggregationEnabled" displayName="partitionAggregationEnabled" type="toggle" defaultValue="false"/> <Field name="numPartitionThreads" displayName="numPartitionThreads" type="number" min="1" max="50" defaultValue="2" parentKey="partitionAggregationEnabled" parentValue="true"/> </Section> <!-- Custom BAPI section --> <Section name="customBapiConf" label="sectionLabel_customBapiConf" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_customBapiConf" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_customBapiConf" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/grc/help/"> <Field name="customBapiName" displayName="customBapiName" type="text"/> </Section> </Menu>
<!-- Additional Settings menu --> <Menu name="additionalSettings" label="menuLabel_additionalSettings"> <!-- Provisioning settings section --> <Section name="provisioningConfiguration" label="sectionLabel_provisioningSettings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_provisioningSettings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_provisioningConf" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/grc/help/"> <Field name="requesterId" displayName="requesterId" type="text" /> <Field name="requesterEmail" displayName="requesterEmail" type="email" /> <Field name="businessProcess" displayName="businessProcess" type="text" defaultValue="basis" /> <Field name="provisioningStatusCheckInterval" displayName="pollingInterval" type="number" defaultValue="60" min="1"/>
<!-- Access request configuration fields --> <Field name="access_request_type_mapping" type="keyValue" displayName="accessReqTypeMapping" readOnly="false"> <Key name="accessReqType" displayName="accessReqType" type="text" required="true" readOnly="false" /> <Value name="accessReqTypeCode" displayName="accessReqTypeCode" type="text" required="true" readOnly="false" /> </Field> <Field name="prov_actions_mapping_for_role" type="keyValue" displayName="roleProvAction" readOnly="false"> <Key name="provisionAction" displayName="provisionAction" type="text" required="true" readOnly="false" /> <Value name="provisionCode" displayName="provisionCode" type="text" required="true" readOnly="false" /> </Field> <Field name="prov_actions_mapping_for_system" type="keyValue" displayName="systemProvAction" readOnly="false"> <Key name="provisionAction" displayName="provisionAction" type="text" required="true" readOnly="false" /> <Value name="provisionCode" displayName="provisionCode" type="text" required="true" readOnly="false" /> </Field>
<Field name="access_request_priority" displayName="accessReqPriority" type="text" required="true"/> </Section> <Section name="enableDisableAllConfiguration" label="sectionLabel_enableDisableSpecificUsersSettings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_enableDisableSpecificUsersSettings"> <Field name="enableDisableUserOnAllSystems" displayName="selectDisableConf" type="radio" defaultValue="true"> <AllowedValues> <Option label="disableAll" value="true"/> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="listOfSysToSkipEnableDisable" type="list" displayName="sysToSkipEnableDisable" parentValue="true" parentKey="enableDisableUserOnAllSystems"/> <Field name="removeRolesOnDisable" displayName="removeRoles" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false"/> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: Active Directory Template

AttributeDefinition.name: cn

Application.name: Oracle EPM Cloud - NR

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the user resource in Oracle EPM Cloud

AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the user to authenticate with the service provider directly

AttributeDefinition.name: PredefinedRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of predefined roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of groups assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: ApplicationRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of application role assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: IDCSGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of IDCS groups assigned to the user on the EPM application

AttributeDefinition.name: Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Display name of IDCS group

AttributeDefinition.name: Predefined Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of Predefined Roles assigned to the IDCS Group on the EPM application

Application.name: IBM DB2 Template

AttributeDefinition.name: CREATE_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time when the role was created

AttributeDefinition.Description: The formatted name of the role

AttributeDefinition.Description: CR P language of the user

AttributeDefinition.Description: CP ISO language of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Language UP ISO
AttributeDefinition.Description: P ISO language of the user

AttributeDefinition.Description: Pager or SMS number list in the format pager_type#pager_number

AttributeDefinition.name: Parameters
AttributeDefinition.Description: Parameter list in the format prameter_ID=parameter_value

AttributeDefinition.Description: PO box number of the city

AttributeDefinition.Description: PO box number of the ISO city

AttributeDefinition.Description: PO box number of the country

AttributeDefinition.name: PO Box Region
AttributeDefinition.Description: PO box number of the region

AttributeDefinition.name: Remote Mail List
AttributeDefinition.Description: Remote mail list of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Searc Term2 P
AttributeDefinition.Description: 2nd search term P for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Search Term P
AttributeDefinition.Description: Search term P for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Tax Jurisdiction Code
AttributeDefinition.Description: Tax jurisdiction code of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: URL Homepage List
AttributeDefinition.Description: URL (Homepage) address list in the format URI_type#URI_name

AttributeDefinition.name: Productive Password
AttributeDefinition.Description: User password set in permanent mode

AttributeDefinition.name: User Valid From
AttributeDefinition.Description: Valid from date for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: User Valid To
AttributeDefinition.Description: Valid to date for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: User Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: User Group Assignments of the user

AttributeDefinition.Description: Contractual user types associated with user

AttributeDefinition.name: Subsystem
AttributeDefinition.Description: System Name for CUA System Aggregation

AttributeDefinition.name: Generated Profile
AttributeDefinition.Description: System Generated Profile associated to Role which in turn has Authorizations.

AttributeDefinition.Description: Transaction Codes added through Role Menu

AttributeDefinition.name: TCodes assigned directly
AttributeDefinition.Description: TCodes assigned directly, and not through the Role menu

AttributeDefinition.name: Other Menu Items
AttributeDefinition.Description: Non transactional items added through the Role menu

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Profile Name along with its Description

AttributeDefinition.name: Subsystem
AttributeDefinition.Description: System Name for CUA System Aggregation

AttributeDefinition.name: User Type Id
AttributeDefinition.Description: User Type Id or License ID

<!-- Load Balancing Configuration --> <Menu name="Load Balancing Configuration" label="con_form_sap_LOADBALANCER"> <Section name="Load Balancing Configuration" label="con_form_sap_LOADBALANCER" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_loadBalancerInfo" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_loadBalancerConfiguration" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/direct/help/"> <Field name="loadBalancerMode" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_sap_LOADBALANCER_Mode" helpKey="help_con_form_erp_loadBalancerEnable" /> <Field name="jco.client.mshost" displayName="con_form_sap_LOADBALANCER_Host" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_LoadBalancer_Host" type="text" parentValue="true" parentKey="loadBalancerMode" /> <Field name="jco.client.group" displayName="con_form_sap_LOADBALANCER_ClientGroup" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_LoadBalancer_ClientGroup" type="text" parentValue="true" parentKey="loadBalancerMode" /> <Field name="jco.client.msserv" displayName="con_form_sap_LOADBALANCER_Port" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_LoadBalancer_Port" type="number" saveAsString="true" parentValue="true" parentKey="loadBalancerMode" /> </Section> </Menu>
<!-- Iteration Partitioning --> <Menu name="Iteration Partitioning" label="con_form_erp_partitioning"> <Section name="Iteration Partitioning" label="con_form_erp_partitioning"> <Field name="partitionMode" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_partitioningMode" helpKey="help_con_form_erp_partitionEnable" /> <Field name="partitionStatements" displayName="con_form_erp_partition_statements" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_partitions" type="textarea-list" parentValue="true" parentKey="partitionMode" /> </Section> </Menu>
<!-- SNC Configuration --> <Menu name="SNC Configuration" label="con_form_sap_SNC"> <Section name="SNC Configuration" label="con_form_sap_SNC" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_sncConfigInfo" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_sncConfiguration" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/sap/direct/help/"> <Field name="jco.client.snc_mode" displayName="con_form_sap_SNC_Mode" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_SNC_Mode" type="radio" defaultValue="0"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="0" label="con_form_sap_SNC_Mode_OFF"/> <Option value="1" label="con_form_sap_SNC_Mode_ON"/> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="jco.client.snc_qop" displayName="con_form_sap_SNC_QOP" type="select" defaultValue="1" parentValue="true" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_SNC_QOP" parentKey="jco.client.snc_mode" required="true"> <AllowedValues> <Option value="1" label="1" /> <Option value="2" label="2" /> <Option value="3" label="3" /> <Option value="8" label="8" /> <Option value="9" label="9" /> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="jco.client.snc_partnername" displayName="con_form_sap_SNC_Parnter_Name" type="text" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_SNC_Partner_Name" parentValue="1" parentKey="jco.client.snc_mode" /> <Field name="jco.client.snc_myname" displayName="con_form_sap_SNC_Name" type="text" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_SNC_Name" parentValue="1" parentKey="jco.client.snc_mode" /> <Field name="jco.client.snc_lib" displayName="con_form_sap_SNC_Lib" type="text" helpKey="help_con_form_sap_SNC_Lib" parentValue="1" parentKey="jco.client.snc_mode" /> </Section> </Menu>
<!-- SAP GRC Settings --> <Menu name="SAP GRC Settings" label="con_form_erp_grc_configuration"> <Section name="SAP GRC Settings" label="con_form_erp_grc_configuration"> <Field name="isGRCEnabled" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_erp_grc_required" helpKey="help_con_form_erp_grc_enabled" /> <Field name="GRCConnectorName" displayName="con_form_erp_grc_connector_name" required="true" helpKey="help_con_form_erp_grc_connector_name" type="text" parentValue="true" parentKey="isGRCEnabled" /> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: SAP BTP Cockpit Cloud Foundry

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: User Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's login name or user name

AttributeDefinition.name: Origin
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's identity provider origin key

AttributeDefinition.name: Created On
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's record creation date and time

AttributeDefinition.name: Last Updated
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's record last modified date and time

AttributeDefinition.name: Role Collections
AttributeDefinition.Description: Groups linked to the user through role assignments

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: Members
AttributeDefinition.Description: The members associated with the group

AttributeDefinition.name: Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Roles associated with the group

AttributeDefinition.name: Mapped entitlements
AttributeDefinition.Description: The indirect or dynamic assignments associated with group

Application.name: Top Secret LDAP Template

AttributeDefinition.name: dn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Distinguished name of Top Secret User

AttributeDefinition.name: AACID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority levels at which ACID can manage ACIDs within scope

AttributeDefinition.name: AdminListData
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to list Security File information

AttributeDefinition.name: Misc1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more administrative functions (LCF, INSTDATA, USER, LTIME, SUSPEND, NOATS, RDT, TSSSIM, ALL)

AttributeDefinition.name: Misc2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more administrative functions (ALL, SMS, TSO, NDT, DLF, APPCLU, WORKATTR, TARGET)

AttributeDefinition.name: Misc3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more administrative functions (ALL, SDT, PTOK)

AttributeDefinition.name: Misc8
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to list the contents of the RDT, FDT or STC or to use the ASUSPEND administrative function (LISTRDT, LISTSTC, LISTAPLU, LISTSDT, MCS, NOMVSDF, PWMAINT, REMASUSP, ALL)

AttributeDefinition.name: Misc9
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more high-level administrative functions (BYPASS, TRACE, CONSOLE, MASTFAC, MODE, STC, GLOBAL, GENERIC, ALL)

AttributeDefinition.name: ASUSPEND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Account is suspended due to administrator action

AttributeDefinition.name: NODSNCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA Top Secret bypasses all data set access security checks for this ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: SITRAN
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS transaction CA Top Secret automatically executes after an ACID successfully signs on to a facility

AttributeDefinition.name: OPIDENT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS operator identification value equal to the ACID OPIDENT entry in the CICS SNT (Signon Table)

AttributeDefinition.name: OPPRTY
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS operator priority of associated ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: SCTYKEY
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS security keys an ACID may use.

AttributeDefinition.name: CONSOLE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Ability to modify control options by ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: GROUPS
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Groups a Top Secret User is a member

AttributeDefinition.name: XSUSPEND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Account is suspended due to CA-Top Secret Installation exit

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST-COUNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of times the ACID has been used (logon times since user was defined)

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSAUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authorize the operator commands that can be entered from the console

AttributeDefinition.name: PROFILES
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Profiles a Top Secret User is a member

AttributeDefinition.name: MODIFIED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date and time when ACID was updated

AttributeDefinition.name: NOPWCHG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACID from changing passwords at signon or initiation

AttributeDefinition.name: OIDCARD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prompt ACID to insert identification cards into a batch reader whenever signing on to TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: DFLTGRP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default group to an ACID operating under OpenEdition MVS

AttributeDefinition.name: UID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Numeric UID value for security within USS

AttributeDefinition.name: PSUSPEND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Account is suspended due to password violation

AttributeDefinition.name: PHYSKEY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Physical security key to support external authentication devices.

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOHCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default hold class for TSO-generated JCL for TSO users

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOJCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Job class for TSO generated job cards from TSO users.

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOCOMMAND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default command issued at TSO logon

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOLPROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default procedure used for TSO logon

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOMSIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum region size (in kilobytes) that a TSO user may specify at logon

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOMCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default message class for TSO generated JCL for TSO users

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOMPW
AttributeDefinition.Description: Support multiple TSO UADS passwords, on a user-by-user basis

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOOPT
AttributeDefinition.Description: default options that a TSO user may specify at logon

AttributeDefinition.name: TSODEST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default destination identifier for TSO generated JCL for TSO users.

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOLSIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default region size (in kilobytes) for TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOSCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default SYSOUT class for TSO generated JCL for TSO users

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOUNIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default unit name for dynamic allocations under TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOUDATA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Site-defined data field to a TSO user

AttributeDefinition.name: PASSINTV
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days during which password remains valid

AttributeDefinition.name: VSUSPEND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Account is suspended due to access violation

AttributeDefinition.name: dn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Distinguished name of Top Secret Profile

AttributeDefinition.name: AUDIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow an audit of ACID activity

AttributeDefinition.name: MODIFIED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date and time when ACID was updated

AttributeDefinition.name: NOPWCHG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACID from changing passwords at signon or initiation

AttributeDefinition.name: OIDCARD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prompt ACID to insert identification cards into a batch reader whenever signing on to TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: SOURCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Source reader or terminal prefixes through which the associated ACID may enter the system

AttributeDefinition.name: LTIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: How long (in minutes) until terminal of ACID locks if CA Top Secret does not detect activity at that terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: dn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Distinguished name of Top Secret Group

AttributeDefinition.name: AUDIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow an audit of ACID activity

AttributeDefinition.name: MODIFIED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date and time when ACID was updated

AttributeDefinition.name: NOPWCHG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACID from changing passwords at signon or initiation

AttributeDefinition.name: OIDCARD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prompt ACID to insert identification cards into a batch reader whenever signing on to TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: SOURCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Source reader or terminal prefixes through which the associated ACID may enter the system

AttributeDefinition.name: LTIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: How long (in minutes) until terminal of ACID locks if CA Top Secret does not detect activity at that terminal

<Form xmlns='http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd' name='Top Secret LDAP Configuration' connectorName="Top Secret LDAP" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" shortDesc="ShortDesc" status="released">
<Menu name="Top Secret LDAP Configuration" label="con_form_top_secret_name"> <Section name ="Top Secret LDAP Configuration" label="con_form_top_secret_name" sectionInfo="con_form_top_secret_name" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_connectionSetting" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/ibm/ca/topsecret_ldap/help/integrating_racf_tss_ldap/connection_settings_tss_ldap.html"> <Field name="host" type="text" required="true" defaultValue="host.example.com" displayName="con_form_ldap_host" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_host"/> <Field name="port" type="number" required="true" defaultValue="389" displayName="con_form_ldap_port" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_port"/>
<Field name="useSSL" type="toggle" defaultValue="true" displayName="con_form_ldap_use_ssl" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_use_ssl"/>
<Field name="user" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_ldap_host" defaultValue="cn=Admin" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_host"/> <Field name="password" type="secret" required="true" displayName="password"/>
<Field name="searchDNs[*].searchDN" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_tss_ldap_suffix" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_search_dn"/> <Field name="searchDNs[*].iterateSearchFilter" type="text" displayName="con_form_tss_ldap_filter" helpKey="help_con_form_ldap_iterate_srch_filter"/> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: Guidewire BillingCenter

AttributeDefinition.name: employeeNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The employee number assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: externalUser
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user is from an organization external to the insurer organization

AttributeDefinition.name: workPhoneCountryCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's work phone country code

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: The group(s) that the user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The role(s) that have been granted to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: supervisor
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the group supervisor

AttributeDefinition.name: carrierInternal
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the role is applicable to internal carrier organization users

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: A detailed description of the role

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The formatted name of the role

Application.name: PeopleSoft Template

AttributeDefinition.name: AccountLocked
AttributeDefinition.Description: Used to deactivate a user profile.The user cannot sign in until you have deselected this option.

AttributeDefinition.name: AllowSwitchUser
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicate that the individual user is permitted to change identities within a PeopleSoft session.

AttributeDefinition.name: DefaultMobilePage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default mobile page that appear after users sign in to their mobile device.

AttributeDefinition.name: ExpertEntry
AttributeDefinition.Description: Select to specify that some users, such as expert or power users, can defer all processing of the data that they enter.

AttributeDefinition.name: FailedLogins
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of failed sign in attempts to allow

AttributeDefinition.name: NavigatorHomePermissionList
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default navigator home page permission list

AttributeDefinition.name: PrimaryEmailAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary email address associated with user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PrimaryPermissionList
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary permission list require to grant data permissions to user

AttributeDefinition.name: ProcessProfilePermissionList
AttributeDefinition.Description: Contains the permissions that a user requires for running batch processes through PeopleSoft Process Scheduler.

AttributeDefinition.name: ReassignWork
AttributeDefinition.Description: Use to reassign pending work for this role user if positions change or a user is temporarily out.

AttributeDefinition.name: ReassignUserID
AttributeDefinition.Description: User to whom work is reassigned

AttributeDefinition.name: Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles and Roles along with Routecontrols assigned to the user - detailed

AttributeDefinition.name: roleNames
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles and Roles along with Routecontrols assigned to the user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: RowSecurityPermissionList
AttributeDefinition.Description: Row security permission list to grant data permissions to user

AttributeDefinition.name: SupervisingUserID
AttributeDefinition.Description: User ID of the user's supervisor

AttributeDefinition.name: SymbolicID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Use to retrieve the appropriate encrypted access ID and access password.

AttributeDefinition.name: WorkListEntriesCount
AttributeDefinition.Description: Worklist items that require a user's attention.

AttributeDefinition.name: ROLENAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles and Roles along with Routecontrols

AttributeDefinition.name: Roles that can be granted
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles that can be granted by this role

AttributeDefinition.name: Roles that can grant
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles that can grant this role
