Application.name: G Suite

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Full name of the user in JSON format.

AttributeDefinition.name: changePasswordAtNextLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user is forced to change password at next login.

AttributeDefinition.name: ipWhitelisted
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicate if user's IP address is white listed.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's E-mail addresses.

AttributeDefinition.name: externalIds
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of external IDs for the user, such as an employee or network ID.

AttributeDefinition.name: relations
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's relationships to other users.

AttributeDefinition.name: addresses
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's addresses.

AttributeDefinition.name: organizations
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of organizations the user belongs to.

AttributeDefinition.name: phones
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's phone numbers.

AttributeDefinition.name: aliases
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of the user's alias E-mail addresses.

AttributeDefinition.name: nonEditableAliases
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of the user's non-editable alias E-mail addresses.

AttributeDefinition.name: customerId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The customer ID to retrieve all account users.

AttributeDefinition.name: orgUnitPath
AttributeDefinition.Description: The full path of the parent organization associated with the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: isMailboxSetup
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user's Google mailbox is created.

AttributeDefinition.name: includeInGlobalAddressList
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user's profile is visible in Global Address List when the contact sharing feature is enabled for the domain.

AttributeDefinition.name: domainName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The domain name of the customer.

AttributeDefinition.name: isPrimary
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the domain is a primary domain.

AttributeDefinition.name: verified
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the verification state of a domain.

AttributeDefinition.name: projectId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ID of the project that owns the service account.

AttributeDefinition.name: uniqueId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique, stable numeric ID for the service account.

AttributeDefinition.name: resourcePermissions
AttributeDefinition.Description: IAM resource permissions assigned to the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: archived
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user is archived.

AttributeDefinition.name: nonEditableAliases
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of the group's non-editable alias E-mail addresses that are outside of the account's primary domain or sub domains. These are functioning E-mail addresses used by the group. This is a read-only property.

AttributeDefinition.name: adminCreated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether it is created by administrator.

AttributeDefinition.name: allowExternalMembers
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if Google Apps users external to your account can view or become members of this group.

AttributeDefinition.name: whoCanPostMessage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permissions to post messages to the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: allowWebPosting
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if any member allowed to post to the group web forum.

AttributeDefinition.name: primaryLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Language tag for a group's primary language.

AttributeDefinition.name: maxMessageBytes
AttributeDefinition.Description: The maximum size of a message.

AttributeDefinition.name: isArchived
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if the contents of the group to be archived.

AttributeDefinition.name: archiveOnly
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if the group to be only archived.

AttributeDefinition.name: spamModerationLevel
AttributeDefinition.Description: Moderation levels for messages detected as spam.

AttributeDefinition.name: replyTo
AttributeDefinition.Description: The default reply to a message is sent here.

AttributeDefinition.name: customReplyTo
AttributeDefinition.Description: An E-mail address used when replying to a message.

AttributeDefinition.name: sendMessageDenyNotification
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if the members are notified if his message is denied by owner.

AttributeDefinition.name: defaultMessageDenyNotificationText
AttributeDefinition.Description: Text sent to the message's author as part of rejection notification.

AttributeDefinition.name: showInGroupDirectory
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if group is listed in the Groups directory.

AttributeDefinition.name: allowGoogleCommunication
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean allowing Google to contact group administrators.

AttributeDefinition.name: membersCanPostAsTheGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if members can post using the group E-mail address.

AttributeDefinition.name: includeInGlobalAddressList
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if group is included in the Global Address List.

AttributeDefinition.name: resourcePermissions
AttributeDefinition.Description: IAM resource permissions assigned to the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable description for the IAM role.

AttributeDefinition.name: title
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable title for the role.

AttributeDefinition.name: includedPermissions
AttributeDefinition.Description: The names of the permissions this IAM role grants when bound in an IAM policy.

AttributeDefinition.name: stage
AttributeDefinition.Description: The current launch stage of the IAM role.

AttributeDefinition.name: deleted
AttributeDefinition.Description: The current deleted state of the IAM role.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name of resource permission is combination of role dispaly name and resource display name.

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description of role associated with reource permission.

AttributeDefinition.name: includedPermissions
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission over the resource include in role.

AttributeDefinition.name: stage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Stage of the role associated with resource permission.

AttributeDefinition.name: resourceName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Resource name associated with the resource permission.

AttributeDefinition.name: roleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Role name associated with the resource permission.

AttributeDefinition.name: resourceType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Type of the resource associated with the resource permission.

AttributeDefinition.name: objectID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Id of the folder in the format folders/{numeric folder id}.

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The full resource name of folder.

AttributeDefinition.name: assetType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Asset Type of the GCP resource.

AttributeDefinition.name: objectID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Id of the project in the format projects/{alpha numeric project id}.

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The full resource name of project.

AttributeDefinition.name: assetType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Asset Type of the GCP resource.

<Field name="clientID" displayName="con_form_GAR_client_ID" type="text" required="true" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_client_ID" parentKey="grantType" parentValue="CLIENT_CREDENTIALS"/> <Field name="clientSecret" displayName="con_form_GAR_client_secret" type="secret" required="true" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_client_secret" parentKey="grantType" parentValue="CLIENT_CREDENTIALS"/> <Field name="refreshToken" displayName="con_form_GAR_refresh_token" type="secret" required="true" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_refresh_token" parentKey="grantType" parentValue="CLIENT_CREDENTIALS"/>

<Field name="enableGcpSupport" hidden="true" /> <Field name="organizationId" displayName="con_form_GAR_organization_id" type="text" parentKey="enableGcpSupport" parentValue="true" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_organization_id"/> </Section> </Menu>
<Menu name="Additional Configuration" label="con_form_gsuite_additional_configuration"> <Section name="Additional Configuration" label="con_form_gsuite_additional_configuration" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_ADVANCED_SETTINGS"> <Field name="groupDetails" displayName="con_form_GAR_group_details" type="select" required="true" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_group_details" defaultValue="Y" > <AllowedValues> <Option value="Y" label="Y"/> <Option value="N" label="N"/> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="pageSize" displayName="con_form_page_size" type="number" defaultValue="100" min="1" max="500" helpKey="help_con_form_page_size" saveAsString="true" /> <Field name="partitionMode" displayName="con_form_GAR_partitioning" type="checkbox" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_partitionEnable" defaultValue="false" /> <Field name="partitionEmail" displayName="con_form_GAR_email_partition" type="textarea-list" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_email_partitions" parentKey="partitionMode" parentValue="true" /> <Field name="partitionGivenName" displayName="con_form_GAR_given_name_partition" type="textarea-list" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_given_name_partitions" parentKey="partitionMode" parentValue="true" /> <Field name="partitionFamilyName" displayName="con_form_GAR_family_name_partition" type="textarea-list" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_family_name_partitions" parentKey="partitionMode" parentValue="true" /> <Field name="accountFilter" displayName="con_form_GAR_account_filter" type="text" helpKey="help_con_form_GAR_account_filter" /> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: Atlassian Suite - Cloud

AttributeDefinition.name: accountId
AttributeDefinition.Description: An unique identifier for an Atlassian User

AttributeDefinition.name: accountType
AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of account that the user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: emailAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: The e-mail address of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: locale
AttributeDefinition.Description: The default location of the user for purpose of localizing items

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of groups that the user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: projectRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of roles that the user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: groupId
AttributeDefinition.Description: An unique identifier for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name of the Project Role

AttributeDefinition.name: projectRoleId
AttributeDefinition.Description: An unique identifier for the project specific roles

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: An unique identifier for the project role

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: The description of the Project Role

AttributeDefinition.name: PredefinedRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of predefined roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Display name of IDCS group

AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of Predefined Roles assigned to the IDCS Group on the EPM application

Application.name: BMC Remedy - Direct

AttributeDefinition.name: ForcePasswordChangeOnLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Set to 'Yes' if the user should be asked to change his password on next login else set to 'No'

AttributeDefinition.name: AccountDisabledDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Account disabled date of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: AppliedDaysAfterExpirationUntilDisablement
AttributeDefinition.Description: Applied Days after expiration until disablement of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: AppliedNewUserMustChangePassword
AttributeDefinition.Description: Set to 'Yes' if the new user must change password

AttributeDefinition.name: AppliedPasswordEnforcementEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Set to 'Yes' if password enforcement is enabled

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModifiedBy
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the user who last modified the user

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModifiedBy
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the user who last modified the group

Application.name: Microsoft SharePoint Server

AttributeDefinition.name: IsDomainGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether the user is part of Domain Group.

AttributeDefinition.name: SID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique security ID for the network account of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Collection of groups of which the user is a member.

AttributeDefinition.name: GroupUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identity attribute of group in format "ParentWeb.Url\GroupName".

AttributeDefinition.name: AllowRequestToJoinLeave
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether to allow users to request for membership of the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: OnlyAllowMembersViewMembership
AttributeDefinition.Description: Who can view the membership of the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: AutoAcceptRequestToJoinLeave
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether membership requests are automatically accepted.

AttributeDefinition.name: RequestToJoinLeaveEmailSetting
AttributeDefinition.Description: Membership requests to this e-mail address.

AttributeDefinition.name: ADGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Collection of AD groups which are member of this SharePoint Group.

Application.featuresString: SEARCH, PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, MANAGER_LOOKUP, ENABLE, PASSWORD
Application.name: SuccessFactors Template

AttributeDefinition.name: Division
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent Division name in the organization data

AttributeDefinition.name: Company
AttributeDefinition.Description: The company under which employee belongs.

AttributeDefinition.name: PositionNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent Position Number associated with Employee

AttributeDefinition.name: JobTitle
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent Job Title Associated with Employee

AttributeDefinition.name: CostCenterID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Cost centre ID associated with employee

AttributeDefinition.name: IsContingentWorker
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent whether Employee is Contingent Worker or Not

AttributeDefinition.name: CostCenter
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent Cost center associated with employee

AttributeDefinition.name: IsFullTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent whether Employee is Full Time or Part Time

AttributeDefinition.name: JobInfoLastModified
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when Job Information was Last Modified

AttributeDefinition.name: FutureActions
AttributeDefinition.Description: Information about Future Actions in JSON format

AttributeDefinition.name: Termination Date
AttributeDefinition.Description: It populates Termination Date for Employees and WorkOrder End Date for Contingent Workers.

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModifiedDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date on which last modification on group is done

AttributeDefinition.name: IsStaticGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: Group is of type static or dynamic

AttributeDefinition.name: Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Roles associated to the access group

AttributeDefinition.name: Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Access groups associated to the role

Application.featuresString: AUTHENTICATE, PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, PASSWORD, ENABLE, SEARCH
Application.name: Azure Active Directory

AttributeDefinition.name: accountEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: True if the account is enabled; otherwise, false

AttributeDefinition.name: assignedLicenses
AttributeDefinition.Description: The licenses that are assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: assignedPlans
AttributeDefinition.Description: The plans that are assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: city
AttributeDefinition.Description: The city in which the user is located

AttributeDefinition.name: country
AttributeDefinition.Description: The country/region in which the user is located

AttributeDefinition.name: department
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name for the department in which the user works

AttributeDefinition.name: dirSyncEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether this object was synced from the on-premises directory

AttributeDefinition.name: disabledPlans
AttributeDefinition.Description: The plans that are not assigned to user

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name displayed in the address book for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: facsimileTelephoneNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The telephone number of the user's business fax machine

AttributeDefinition.name: appRoleAssignments
AttributeDefinition.Description: Application roles assigned to a user

AttributeDefinition.name: immutableId
AttributeDefinition.Description: This property is used to associate an on-premises Active Directory user account to their Microsoft Entra ID user object

AttributeDefinition.name: lastDirSyncTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the last time at which the object was synced with the on-premises directory

AttributeDefinition.name: mail
AttributeDefinition.Description: The SMTP address for the user, for example, "john@contoso.onmicrosoft.com"

AttributeDefinition.name: mailNickname
AttributeDefinition.Description: The mail alias for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: signInNames
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the collection of sign-in names for a local account in an Azure Active Directory B2C tenant

AttributeDefinition.name: userIdentities
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the collection of userIdentities for a social user account in an Azure Active Directory B2C tenant

AttributeDefinition.name: creationType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user account is a local account for an Azure Active Directory B2C tenant

AttributeDefinition.name: mobile
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary cellular telephone number for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: objectId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: onPremisesSecurityIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: Contains the on-premises security identifier (SID) for the user that was synchronized from on-premises to the cloud

AttributeDefinition.name: otherMails
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of additional email addresses for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: passwordPolicies
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies password policies for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: physicalDeliveryOfficeName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The office location in the user's place of business

AttributeDefinition.name: postalCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ZIP OR postal code for the user's postal address

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Preferred written or spoken language for a person

AttributeDefinition.name: proxyAddresses
AttributeDefinition.Description: Proxy addresses, for example: ["SMTP: bob@contoso.com", "smtp: bob@sales.contoso.com"]

AttributeDefinition.name: sipProxyAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the voice over IP (VOIP) session initiation protocol (SIP) address for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: state
AttributeDefinition.Description: The state or province in the user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: streetAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: The street address of the user's place of business

AttributeDefinition.name: telephoneNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary telephone number of the user's place of business

AttributeDefinition.name: usageLocation
AttributeDefinition.Description: A two letter country code indicating usage location

AttributeDefinition.name: userPrincipalName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user principal name (UPN) of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: riskLevel
AttributeDefinition.Description: Level of the detected risky user

AttributeDefinition.name: riskLastUpdatedDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date and time that the risky user was last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: channels
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of channel membership of a user

AttributeDefinition.name: azureADEligibleRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Microsoft Entra ID Eligible Roles

AttributeDefinition.name: azureADActiveRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Microsoft Entra ID Active Roles

AttributeDefinition.name: accessPackages
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Access Packages assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: dirSyncEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether this object was synced from the on-premises directory.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: lastDirSyncTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the last time at which the object was synced with the on-premises directory

AttributeDefinition.name: mail
AttributeDefinition.Description: The SMTP address for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: mailEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether the group is mail-enabled

AttributeDefinition.name: mailNickname
AttributeDefinition.Description: The mail alias for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: onPremisesSecurityIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: Contains the on-premises security identifier (SID) for the group that was synchronized from on-premises to the cloud

AttributeDefinition.name: securityEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether the group is a security group

AttributeDefinition.name: teamsEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether teams has been enabled for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: The description for the Microsoft Entra ID role

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name for the Microsoft Entra ID role

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier for the Microsoft Entra ID role

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag indicating whether the role is part of the default set included in Microsoft Entra ID or a custom role

AttributeDefinition.name: isEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag indicating whether the role is enabled for assignment. If false the role is not available for assignment

AttributeDefinition.name: rolePermissions
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of permissions included in the role

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name for the application role

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier for the application role

AttributeDefinition.name: allowedMemberTypes
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allowed member types for application role

AttributeDefinition.name: isEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: States whether the application role is enabled or not

AttributeDefinition.name: objectId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier for the service plan which is a combination of skuId and servicePlanId separated by colon (:).

AttributeDefinition.name: skuId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier (GUID) for the License Pack.

AttributeDefinition.name: skuPartNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The SKU part number of the License Pack. For example, AAD_PREMIUM.

AttributeDefinition.name: appliesTo
AttributeDefinition.Description: Object types to which the license pack can be assigned. For example: User, Company.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name of service plan which is a combination of skuPartNumber and servicePlanName separated by colon (:).

AttributeDefinition.name: servicePlanId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier of the service plan.

AttributeDefinition.name: servicePlanName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the service plan.

AttributeDefinition.name: provisioningStatus
AttributeDefinition.Description: The provisioning status of the service plan.

AttributeDefinition.name: owners
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of owners of the private channel

AttributeDefinition.name: isFavoriteByDefault
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the channel should automatically be marked 'favorite' for all members of the team

AttributeDefinition.name: teamEmail
AttributeDefinition.Description: The email address of the parent team

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether role is custom or built-in

AttributeDefinition.name: scope
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope at which role can be assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether role is custom or built-in

AttributeDefinition.name: scope
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope at which role can be assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Microsoft Entra ID Role Display Name

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Microsoft Entra ID Active Role ID

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether role is custom or built-in

AttributeDefinition.name: scope
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope at which role can be assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Microsoft Entra ID Eligible Role ID

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether role is custom or built-in

AttributeDefinition.name: scope
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope at which role can be assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier of the Access Package.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name made by combining Access Package name and Policy name.

AttributeDefinition.name: policyDescription
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description of the Access Package's policy.

AttributeDefinition.name: expiration
AttributeDefinition.Description: Expiration time for the Access Package's policy.

AttributeDefinition.name: isHidden
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the Access Package is hidden from end users on My Access portal.

AttributeDefinition.name: catalog
AttributeDefinition.Description: Container where the Access Package resides.

Field.name: Alias
Field.Description: Take first letter of first name and squish it together for an 8 character alias. Otherwise use first 8 characters of the identity's name.

Field.helpKey: It is unique name for the Public Group. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores.
Field.name: DeveloperName

Field.helpKey: Indicates whether the managers have access (true) or do not have access (false) to records shared with members of the group.
Field.name: DoesIncludeBosses

Field.helpKey: It is unique name for the Public Group.This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores.

Field.helpKey: ID of the user who owns the group.
Field.name: OwnerId

Field.helpKey: Indicates whether the managers have access (true) or do not have access (false) to records shared with members of the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: Street
AttributeDefinition.Description: The street address associated with the User.

AttributeDefinition.name: IsActive
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag that indicates if the user is active in Salesforce.

AttributeDefinition.name: IsFrozen
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag that indicates if the user is frozen in Salesforce.

AttributeDefinition.name: Username
AttributeDefinition.Description: Contains the name that a user enters to log into the API or the user interface.

AttributeDefinition.name: EmailEncodingKey
AttributeDefinition.Description: Encoding that should be used during email communications.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserPermissionsMarketingUser
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maps to the Marketing User Flag.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserPermissionsOfflineUser
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maps to the Offline user Flag.

AttributeDefinition.name: ProfileId
AttributeDefinition.Description: ID of the profile assigned to a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: ProfileName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the profile assigned to a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: PublicGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Public groups are the entitlements for user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Role
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Role assigned to a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserType
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is user type of salesforce user i.e Standard, Partner, AutomatedProcess.

AttributeDefinition.name: ManagedPackage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Managed Package assigned to a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: CollaborationGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: Collaboration Group Id assigned to a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: DelegateGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ID of the Delegate Group assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: FederationIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Federation IDs is an identifier that is unique within a salesforce Organization.

AttributeDefinition.name: Id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The internal id for this group.

AttributeDefinition.name: Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The friendly name assigned to the profile.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserType
AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the type of profile even though the attribute name would indicate a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The internal id for this group.

AttributeDefinition.name: Label
AttributeDefinition.Description: The friendly name assigned to the profile.

AttributeDefinition.name: CaseAccessForAccountOwner
AttributeDefinition.Description: The case access level for the account owner

AttributeDefinition.name: ContactAccessForAccountOwner
AttributeDefinition.Description: The contact access level for the account owner

AttributeDefinition.name: OpportunityAccessForAccountOwner
AttributeDefinition.Description: The opportunity access level for the account owner

AttributeDefinition.name: ParentRoleId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier for the Role's parent Role

AttributeDefinition.name: DeveloperName
AttributeDefinition.Description: It is unique name for the Public Group

AttributeDefinition.name: DoesIncludeBosses
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the managers have access (true) or do not have access (false) to records shared with members of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: OwnerId
AttributeDefinition.Description: ID of the user who owns the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: DeveloperName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique developer name for the delegate group

AttributeDefinition.name: IsLoginAccessEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if login access is enabled for the developer group

Application.name: Workday Accounts

AttributeDefinition.name: FILENUMBER
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier for Employee, Contractor, Service Center Representative, Extended Enterprise Learner, Implementer, Integration and Students System accounts

AttributeDefinition.name: ACCOUNT_DISABLED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies whether Workday Account is disabled

AttributeDefinition.name: REQUIRE_NEW_PASSWORD_AT_NEXT_SIGN_IN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether Workday account will require new password while next sign in

AttributeDefinition.name: SESSION_TIMEOUT_MINUTES
AttributeDefinition.Description: The number of minutes the user may be idle

AttributeDefinition.name: MULTI_FACTOR_AUTHENTICATION_GRACE_PERIOD_ENABLED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Disable user's multi-factor authentication grace period

AttributeDefinition.name: GRACE_PERIOD_LOGINS_REMAINING
AttributeDefinition.Description: The remaining number of times the user can login without providing multi-factor authentication passcode

AttributeDefinition.name: ACCOUNT_EXPIRATION_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevents user from signing on to the system after this date

AttributeDefinition.name: OPENID_IDENTIFIER
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email address associated with the OpenID account

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKER_TYPE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Workers type (Employee|Contingent_Worker|Service Center Representative|Extended Enterprise Learner|Implementer Account|Integration System User|Applicant Student|Prospect Student|Pre-Matriculant Student|Matriculant Student)

AttributeDefinition.name: IS_FUTURE_WORKER
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether Workday account is Future Hire

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The internal id for this group.

<Field name="customTimeOut" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_custom_timeout" type="number" min="0" max="999" defaultValue="1" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_custom_timeout"/> <Field name="pageSize" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_page_size" type="number" defaultValue="500" min="1" max="999" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_page_size" saveAsString="true"/> </Section> </Menu>

Application.name: LDIF Template

AttributeDefinition.name: cn
AttributeDefinition.Description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: dn
AttributeDefinition.Description: distinguished name for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: departmentNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: identifies a department within an organization

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: preferred name to be used when displaying entries

AttributeDefinition.name: employeeNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: numerically identifies an employee within an organization

AttributeDefinition.name: employeeType
AttributeDefinition.Description: type of employment for a person

AttributeDefinition.name: givenName
AttributeDefinition.Description: first name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups a user is a member

AttributeDefinition.name: initials
AttributeDefinition.Description: initials of some or all of names, but not the surname(s).

AttributeDefinition.name: ou
AttributeDefinition.Description: organizational unit this object belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: preferred written or spoken language for a person

AttributeDefinition.name: sn
AttributeDefinition.Description: last (family) name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: st
AttributeDefinition.Description: state or province which this object resides in

AttributeDefinition.name: cn
AttributeDefinition.Description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: ou
AttributeDefinition.Description: organizational unit this object belongs to

Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, SEARCH, UNSTRUCTURED_TARGETS, ENABLE, PASSWORD, UNLOCK
Application.name: RACF Full Template

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups this user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: SYSTEM_ACCESS
AttributeDefinition.Description: SPECIAL, OPERATIONS, AUDITOR OR ROAUDIT privileges at system level

AttributeDefinition.name: DCERT.VALID_NOT_BEFORE.1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Local date and time from which the certificate is valid

AttributeDefinition.name: DCERT.VALID_NOT_AFTER.1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Local date and time after which the certificate is no longer valid

AttributeDefinition.name: DCERT.VALID_NOT_BEFORE.2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Local date and time from which the certificate is valid

AttributeDefinition.name: DCERT.VALID_NOT_AFTER.2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Local date and time after which the certificate is no longer valid

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHORITY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Group authority level for user in the default group (USE / CREATE / CONNECT / JOIN)

AttributeDefinition.name: ADSP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permanent tape and DASD data sets created by the user are protected by discrete profiles

AttributeDefinition.name: CATEGORY
AttributeDefinition.Description: User access to resources is additionally protected by the security categories

AttributeDefinition.name: CLAUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: Classes in which user is allowed to define profiles

AttributeDefinition.name: GRPACC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Group data sets protected by DATASET profiles defined by this user are automatically accessible to other users in the group

AttributeDefinition.name: INTERVAL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days during which a user's password and password phrase (if set) remain valid

AttributeDefinition.name: MODEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Discrete data set profile name that is used as a model when new data set profiles are created that have userid as the high-level qualifier

AttributeDefinition.name: NAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: User name associated with the user ID

AttributeDefinition.name: OIDCARD
AttributeDefinition.Description: User must supply an operator identification card when logging onto the system

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERATIONS
AttributeDefinition.Description: User has authorization to do maintenance operations on all RACF-protected resources

AttributeDefinition.name: RESUME_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Starting date when user will be allowed to access the system again

AttributeDefinition.name: REVOKE_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Starting date when user will be disallowed to access the system

AttributeDefinition.name: UAUDIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: RACF logs most events and changed done by the user

AttributeDefinition.name: WHEN.DAYS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Days of the week when the user is allowed to access the system from a terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: WHEN.TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Hours in the day when the user is allowed to access the system from a terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.INTERVAL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days during which a user's password and password phrase (if set) remain valid

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.CREATE_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when user was defined to RACF

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.LAST_LOGIN_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date user login to system

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.LAST_LOGIN_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last time in INFO.LAST_LOGIN_DATE when user login to system

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.PASSCHG_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date user changed his password

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.PHRSCHG_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date user changed password phrase

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.OPIDENT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Operator ID for use by BMS - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.OPCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: classes assigned to this operator to which BMS (basic mapping support) messages are to be routed - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.OPPRTY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Priority of the operator - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.TIMEOUT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time, in hours and minutes, that the operator is allowed to be idle before being signed off. - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.XRFSOFF
AttributeDefinition.Description: FORCE means that the user is signed off by CICS when an XRF takeover occurs - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DFP.DATAAPPL
AttributeDefinition.Description: DFP data application identifier - DFP segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.ALTGRP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Alternate console group used in recovery - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.AUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: authority this console has to issue operator commands (MASTER,ALL,INFO,CONS,IO,SYS) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.AUTO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether the extended console can receive messages that have been automated by the Message Processing Facility (MPF) in the sysplex (YES / NO) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.CMDSYS
AttributeDefinition.Description: System name to which commands issued from this console are sent - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.DOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether this console receives delete operator message (DOM)requests (NORMAL / ALL / NONE) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.KEY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name to display information for all consoles with the specified key by using the MVS command DISPLAY CONSOLES,KEY - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.LEVEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Messages this console receives (R, I, CE, E, IN, NB or ALL) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.LOGCMDRESP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether command responses are logged (YES / NO) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MFORM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Format in which messages are displayed at the console (J, M, S, T, X) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MIGID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Migration ID which is assigned to this console - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MONITOR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Information displayed when jobs, TSO sessions, or data set status are being monitored - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MSCOPE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Systems from which this console can receive messages that are not directed to a specific console - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.ROUTCODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Routing codes of messages this console receives - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.STORAGE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Amount of storage in megabytes in the TSO address space that can be used for message queuing to this console - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.UD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether this console is to receive undelivered messages (YES / NO) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.ACCTNUM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default TSO account number when logging on - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.COMMAND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Command run during TSO logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.DEST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default destination to which the system routes dynamically-allocated SYSOUT data sets - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.MAXSIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum region size the user can request at logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.PROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default logon procedure name when logging on through TSO logon panel - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.SECLABEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security label entered or used during TSO LOGON - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.SIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default or requested region size during TSO logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.UNIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default name of a device or group of devices that a procedure uses for allocations - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.USERDATA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Optional installation data defined for the user - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WAACCNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Account number for APPC processing - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WAADDR1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional address line #1 for SYSOUT delivery - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WAADDR2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional address line #2 for SYSOUT delivery - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WAADDR3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional address line #3 for SYSOUT delivery - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WAADDR4
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional address line #4 for SYSOUT delivery - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WABLDG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Building that SYSOUT information is to be delivered to - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WADEPT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Department that SYSOUT information is to be delivered to - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WANAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: User name that SYSOUT information is to be delivered to - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: WORKATTR.WAROOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Room that SYSOUT information is to be delivered to. - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.ASSIZEMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: RLIMIT_AS hard limit (maximum) resource value that processes receive when they are dubbed a process - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.CPUTIMEMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: RLIMIT_CPU hard limit (maximum) resource value that OMVS processes receive when they are dubbed a process - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.FILEPROCMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of files this user is allowed to have concurrently active or open - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.HOME
AttributeDefinition.Description: OMVS initial directory pathname - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.MMAPAREAMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum amount of data space storage, in pages, that can be allocated by the user for memory mappings of OMVS files - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.PROCUSERMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of processes this user is allowed to have active at the same time, regardless of how the process became OMVS process - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.PROGRAM
AttributeDefinition.Description: First program started when TSO command OMVS is entered or when a batch job is started using the BPXBATCH program - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.THREADSMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of pthread_create threads, including those running, queued, and exited but not detached, that this user can have concurrently active - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: LNOTES.SNAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Lotus Notes for zOS short-name of the user - LNOTES segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NDS.UNAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Novell Directory Services for zOS user-name of the user - NDS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.CONSNAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default MCS console name used for this operator. Relevant when no console name is used on the NetView GETCONID command - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.CTL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a security check is performed for this NetView operator when trying to use a span or trying to do a cross-domain logon (GENERAL, GLOBAL, SPECIFIC) - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.DOMAINS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifiers of NetView programs in another NetView domain where this operator can start a cross-domain session - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.IC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Command or command list to be processed by NetView for this operator when this operator logs on to NetView - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.MSGRECVR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether this operator is to receive unsolicited messages that are not routed to a specific NetView operator - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.NGMFADMN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a NetView operator has administrator authority to the NetView Graphic Monitor Facility (NGMF). - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.NGMFVSPN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Reserved for future use by the NetView Graphic Monitor Facility - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.OPCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: NetView scope classes for which the operator has authority - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.AUTOLOGIN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether OMVS DCE is to log this user into OMVS DCE automatically - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.DCENAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE principal name defined for this RACF user in the DCE registry - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.HOMECELL
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE cell name defined for this RACF user - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.HOMEUUID
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE universal unique identifier (UUID) for the cell that this user is defined to - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.UUID
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE universal unique identifier (UUID) of the DCE principal defined in DCENAME - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OVM.FSROOT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Pathname for the file system root - OVM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OVM.PROGRAM
AttributeDefinition.Description: PROGRAM pathname of OMVS shell program) - OVM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.LDAPHOST
AttributeDefinition.Description: URL of the LDAP server which the zOS LDAP server contacts when acting as a proxy on behalf of a requester - PROXY segment

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDDN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Distinguished name (DN) which the zOS LDAP server uses when acting as a proxy on behalf of a requester - PROXY segment

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDPW
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password which the zOS LDAP server uses when acting as a proxy on behalf of a requester - PROXY segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OWNER
AttributeDefinition.Description: RACF defined user or group which is the owner of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: UNIVERSAL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Universal group with effectively unlimited number of users who may be connected to it

AttributeDefinition.name: MODEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: A discrete MVS data set profile whcih is the model for new data sets of this group

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.CREATE_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when this group was defined to RACF

AttributeDefinition.name: SUBGROUP
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of all groups which this group is their SUPGROUP

AttributeDefinition.name: TERMUACC
AttributeDefinition.Description: During terminal authorization checking, RACF allows any user in the group access to a terminal based on the universal access authority for that terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: OVM.GID
AttributeDefinition.Description: OpenExtensions VM group identifier - OVM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DFP.DATAAPPL
AttributeDefinition.Description: DFP data application identifier - DFP segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TME.ROLES
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of roles that reference this group - TME segment

<Form xmlns='http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd' name='RACF' connectorName="RACF - Full" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" shortDesc="ShortDesc" status="released">
<Menu name="Connector Gateway Settings" label="con_form_sm_settings"> <Section name ="Connector Gateway Settings" label="con_form_sm_settings" sectionInfo="con_form_sm_settings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_connectionCredentials" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/ibm/racf/help/integrating_racf/connection_settings.html"> <Field name="host" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_sm_host" helpKey="con_help_sm_host"/> <Field name="port" type="number" required="true" displayName="con_form_sm_port" min="0" helpKey="con_help_sm_port"/>
<Field name="MscsName" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_sm_mscs_name" placeHolder="placeHolder_MscsName" helpKey="con_help_sm_mscs_name"/>
<Field name="user" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_sm_user" helpKey="con_help_sm_user"/> <Field name="password" type="secret" displayName="con_form_sm_password" helpKey="con_help_sm_password" />
<Field name="TLSEnabled" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_sm_enable_tls" helpKey="con_help_sm_enable_tls"/> <Field name="enablePE2TLSAuth" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_sm_enable_clientauth" parentKey="TLSEnabled" parentValue="true" helpKey="con_help_sm_enable_clientauth" />
<Field name="disableHostnameVerification" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" displayName="disableHostnameVerification" parentKey="TLSEnabled" parentValue="true"/> <Field name="CGCertSubject" displayName="CGCertSubject" type="text" helpKey="helpKey_cGCertSubject" parentKey="disableHostnameVerification" parentValue="false"/>
<Field name="keystorePath" displayName="con_form_sm_keystorepath" type="text" parentKey="enablePE2TLSAuth" parentValue="true" helpKey="con_help_sm_keystorepath" /> <Field name="keystorePassword" displayName="con_form_sm_keystorepassword" type="secret" parentKey="enablePE2TLSAuth" parentValue="true" helpKey="con_help_sm_keystorepassword" /> <Field name="keyPassword" displayName="con_form_sm_keypassword" type="secret" parentKey="enablePE2TLSAuth" parentValue="true" helpKey="con_help_sm_keypassword" />
<Field name="managePrivilegedAccess" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" displayName="con_form_sm_manage_privileged_access" helpKey="con_help_sm_manage_privileged_access"/>
</Section> </Menu> <Menu name="Aggregation Scope Settings" label="con_form_sm_filter_settings"> <Section name ="Aggregation Scope Settings" label="con_form_sm_filter_settings" sectionInfo="con_form_sm_filter_settings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_aggregationSetting" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/ibm/racf/help/integrating_racf/aggregation_settings.html"> <Field name="accountStartsWithFilter" type="textarea-list" displayName="con_form_sm_account_starts_with_filter" helpKey="con_help_sm_account_starts_with_filter"/> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

AttributeDefinition.name: userName
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the user and authenticates the user in Webex. This must be set to the user's primary email address. No other user in Webex may have the same userName value and thus is required to be unique within Webex.

AttributeDefinition.name: active
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean value of "true" or "false" indicating whether the user is active in Webex.

AttributeDefinition.name: accountStatus
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the active status of the user's account in Webex.

AttributeDefinition.name: name.givenName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The given name of the user, or first name in most Western languages (e.g., "Sarah" given the full name "Ms. Sarah J Henderson, III").

AttributeDefinition.name: name.familyName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The family name of the user, or last name in most Western languages (e.g., "Henderson" given the full name "Ms. Sarah J Henderson, III").

AttributeDefinition.name: name.middleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The middle name(s) of the user (e.g., "Jane" given the full name "Ms. Sarah Jane Henderson, III").

AttributeDefinition.name: name.honorificPrefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The honorific prefix(es) of the user, or title in most Western languages (e.g., "Ms." given the full name "Ms. Sarah J Henderson, III").

AttributeDefinition.name: name.honorificSuffix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The honorific suffix(es) of the user, or suffix in most Western languages (e.g., "III" given the full name "Ms. Sarah J Henderson, III").

AttributeDefinition.name: addresses.type
AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of the address. e.g. 'work', 'home' etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: addresses.streetAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information. This attribute MAY contain new lines.

AttributeDefinition.name: addresses.locality
AttributeDefinition.Description: The city or locality component of the user's address.

AttributeDefinition.name: addresses.region
AttributeDefinition.Description: The state or region component of the user's address.

AttributeDefinition.name: addresses.postalCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ZIP code or postal code component of the user's address.

AttributeDefinition.name: addresses.country
AttributeDefinition.Description: The country name component of the user's address.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name displayed for the user in Webex.

AttributeDefinition.name: nickName
AttributeDefinition.Description: A casual name of the user. For example, Bob when the user's formal name is Robert.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.work.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable description for the user's primary work email, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.work.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable description of the user's secondary work email, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.work.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's primary work email address.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.work.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's secondary work email address.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.home.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's primary home email address, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.home.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's secondary home email address, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.home.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's primary home email address.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.home.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's secondary home email address.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.other.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's primary tertiary email address, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.other.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's secondary tertiary email address, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.other.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's primary tertiary email address.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.other.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's secondary tertiary email address.

AttributeDefinition.name: userType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Used to identify the relationship between the organization and the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: profileUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: A fully qualified URL pointing to a page representing the user's online profile.

AttributeDefinition.name: title
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's business title. Examples of a title is "Business Manager". "Senior Accountant", "Engineer" etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: locale
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's locale which represents the user's currency, time format, and numerical representations.

AttributeDefinition.name: timezone
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's time zone specified in the IANA timezone timezone format, for example, "America/Los_Angeles".

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.work.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's primary work phone number, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.work.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's secondary work phone number, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.work.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's primary work phone number.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.work.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's secondary work phone number.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.home.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's primary home phone number, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.home.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's secondary home phone number, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.home.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's primary home phone number.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.home.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's secondary home phone number.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.mobile.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's primary mobile phone number, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.mobile.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the user's secondary mobile phone number, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.mobile.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's primary mobile phone number.

AttributeDefinition.name: phoneNumbers.mobile.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's secondary mobile phone number.

AttributeDefinition.name: display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of groups to which the user belongs.

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of roles to which the user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: licenses
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's licenses.

AttributeDefinition.name: sipAddresses.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: SIP address values for the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: externalId
AttributeDefinition.Description: An identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.

AttributeDefinition.name: members.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of members of this group.

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the role

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier for the licensed feature.

AttributeDefinition.name: totalUnits
AttributeDefinition.Description: Total number of license units allocated.

AttributeDefinition.name: consumedUnits
AttributeDefinition.Description: Total number of license units consumed

AttributeDefinition.name: consumedByUsers
AttributeDefinition.Description: Total number of license units consumed by users

AttributeDefinition.name: consumedByWorkspaces
AttributeDefinition.Description: Total number of license units consumed by workspaces

AttributeDefinition.name: subscriptionId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The subscription ID associated with this license. This ID is used in other systems, such as Webex Control Hub.

AttributeDefinition.name: siteUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: The Webex Meetings site associated with this license

AttributeDefinition.name: siteType
AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of site associated with this license

Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, ENABLE, UNLOCK, SEARCH, UNSTRUCTURED_TARGETS, PASSWORD, CURRENT_PASSWORD
Application.name: AIX - Direct

entry.key: You are not authorized to change
entry.value: You are not authorized to change password

entry.key: BAD PASSWORD: is too similar to the old one
entry.value: BAD PASSWORD: Password is too similar to the old one.

entry.key: BAD PASSWORD: it is based on a dictionary word
entry.value: BAD PASSWORD: Password is based on a dictionary word.

entry.key: is not in the sudoers file. This incident will be reported.

entry.value: Cannot update the /etc/group or /etc/user_attr file but the login is removed from the /etc/passwd file.
Cannot remove or otherwise modify the home directory.
Invalid command syntax. A usage message for the userdel command is displayed.
The account to be removed does not exist.
The account to be removed is in use.

AttributeDefinition.name: login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user can log in to the system with the login command

AttributeDefinition.name: su
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether another user can switch to the specified user account with the su command

AttributeDefinition.name: rlogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permits access to the account from a remote location with the telnet or rlogin commands

AttributeDefinition.name: daemon
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user specified by the Name parameter can run programs using the cron daemon or the src (system resource controller) daemon

AttributeDefinition.name: dce_export
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allows the DCE registry to overwrite the local user information with the DCE user information during a DCE export operation

AttributeDefinition.name: sugroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the groups that can use the su command to switch to the specified user account

AttributeDefinition.name: admgroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the groups that the user administrates

AttributeDefinition.name: tpath
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the user's trusted path status

AttributeDefinition.name: ttys
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the terminals that can access the account specified by the Name parameter

AttributeDefinition.name: expires
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the expiration date of the account

AttributeDefinition.name: auth1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the primary methods for authenticating the user

AttributeDefinition.name: auth2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the secondary methods used to authenticate the user

AttributeDefinition.name: logintimes
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the days and times that the user is allowed to access the system

AttributeDefinition.name: loginretries
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of unsuccessful login attempts allowed after the last successful login before the system locks the account

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdwarntime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of days before the system issues a warning that a password change is required

AttributeDefinition.name: account_locked
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user account is locked

AttributeDefinition.name: minage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum age (in weeks) a password must be before it can be changed

AttributeDefinition.name: maxage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum age (in weeks) of a password

AttributeDefinition.name: maxexpired
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum time (in weeks) beyond the maxage value that a user can change an expired password

AttributeDefinition.name: minalpha
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of alphabetic characters that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minother
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: mindiff
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of characters required in a new password that were not in the old password

AttributeDefinition.name: maxrepeats
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum number of times a character can be repeated in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minlen
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum length of a password

AttributeDefinition.name: histexpire
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the period of time (in weeks) that a user cannot reuse a password

AttributeDefinition.name: histsize
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdchecks
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the password restriction methods enforced on new passwords

AttributeDefinition.name: default_roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the default roles for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: fsize
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the soft limit for the largest file a user's process can create or extend

AttributeDefinition.name: cpu
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the soft limit for the largest amount of system unit time (in seconds) that a user's process can use

AttributeDefinition.name: data
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest data segment for a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: stack
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest process stack segment for a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: core
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest core file a user's process can create

AttributeDefinition.name: rss
AttributeDefinition.Description: The soft limit for the largest amount of physical memory a user's process can allocate

AttributeDefinition.name: nofiles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the soft limit for the number of file descriptors a user process may have open at one time

AttributeDefinition.name: stack_hard
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the largest process stack segment of a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: time_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the number of seconds since the epoch (00:00:00 GMT, January 1, 1970) since the last successful login

AttributeDefinition.name: tty_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the terminal on which the user last logged in

AttributeDefinition.name: host_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the host from which the user last logged in

AttributeDefinition.name: unsuccessful_login_count
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the number of unsuccessful login attempts since the last successful login

AttributeDefinition.name: lastPasswordUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the time when user's password last updated.

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The administrative roles for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the groups to which user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: host_last_unsuccessful_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies last unsuccessful login of host

AttributeDefinition.name: minloweralpha
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of alphabetic characters in lowercase that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minupperalpha
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of alphabetic characters in uppercase that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minspecialchar
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of special characters that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: mindigit
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of digit that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: tty_last_unsuccessful_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies last unsuccessful login of host from tty

AttributeDefinition.name: admin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the administrative status of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: users
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of one or more users in the form: User1,User2,...,Usern. Separate group member names with commas

AttributeDefinition.Description: distinguished name for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.Description: numerically identifies an employee within an organization

AttributeDefinition.name: givenName
AttributeDefinition.Description: first name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: groups

AttributeDefinition.name: initials
AttributeDefinition.Description: initials of some or all of names, but not the surname(s).

AttributeDefinition.name: ou
AttributeDefinition.Description: organizational unit this object belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: preferred written or spoken language for a person

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdReset
AttributeDefinition.Description: specifies whether the password has been reset by admin

AttributeDefinition.name: sn
AttributeDefinition.Description: last (family) name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: st
AttributeDefinition.Description: state or province which this object resides in

AttributeDefinition.name: cn
AttributeDefinition.Description: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

AttributeDefinition.name: ou
AttributeDefinition.Description: organizational unit this object belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: accessMode
AttributeDefinition.Description: Type of user(Read-Write, Administrative, Read, Support User, Non-interactive, Delegated Admin)

AttributeDefinition.name: businessunitName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the business unit to which the user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: domainName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Domain of which the user is a member

AttributeDefinition.name: internalEmailAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Internal email address for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: mobilePhone
AttributeDefinition.Description: Mobile phone number for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: parentSystemUserId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier of the manager of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: positionName
AttributeDefinition.Description: User's position in hierarchical security model

AttributeDefinition.name: securityRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security Roles assigned to the User

AttributeDefinition.name: territoryName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the territory to which the user is assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: administratorName
AttributeDefinition.Description: FullName of the primary user responsible for the team

AttributeDefinition.name: businessunitName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the business unit to which the team belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: isDefault
AttributeDefinition.Description: Information about whether the team is a default business unit team

AttributeDefinition.name: membershipType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Information about team membership type(Members and guests, Members, Owners, Guests)

AttributeDefinition.name: securityRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security Roles assigned to the team

AttributeDefinition.name: systemManaged
AttributeDefinition.Description: Select whether the team will be managed by the system

AttributeDefinition.name: teamType
AttributeDefinition.Description: The team type(Owner, Access, AAD Security Group, AAD Office Group)

AttributeDefinition.name: businessunitName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the business unit to which the team belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: componentState
AttributeDefinition.Description: State of the role(Published, Unpublished, Unpublished, Deleted Unpublished)

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Combination of business unit name and role name

AttributeDefinition.name: isInherited
AttributeDefinition.Description: Role is inherited by users from team membership, if role associated with team

AttributeDefinition.name: organizationId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the role

Application.name: SAP HANA

AttributeDefinition.name: VALID_FROM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specify a date time from which the user account is valid.

AttributeDefinition.name: VALID_UNTIL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specify a date time until which the user account is valid.

AttributeDefinition.name: SAML_PROVIDER
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of Identity Provider for SAML.

AttributeDefinition.name: SAML_PROVIDERS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Names of SAML Providers with respect to their External Identifiers in the format of Provider::ExternalIdentifier.

AttributeDefinition.name: IS_KERBEROS_ENABLED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies if Kerberos authentication is enabled for user.

AttributeDefinition.name: IS_SAML_ENABLED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies if SAML authentication is enabled for user.

AttributeDefinition.name: IS_RESTRICTED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies if the user is a restricted user

AttributeDefinition.name: IS_CLIENT_CONNECT_ENABLED
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies if the user is able to connect to client

AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the non-unique display name of the graph subject. To change this field, you must alter its value in the source provider.

AttributeDefinition.name: domain
AttributeDefinition.Description: This represents the name of the container of origin for a graph member.

AttributeDefinition.Description: The meta type of the user in the origin, such as "member", "guest", etc.

AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of source provider for the origin identifier (ex:AD, AAD, MSA)

AttributeDefinition.name: originId

AttributeDefinition.Description: This is the PrincipalName of this graph member from the source provider.

AttributeDefinition.name: subjectKind
AttributeDefinition.Description: This field identifies the type of the graph subject

AttributeDefinition.name: url
AttributeDefinition.Description: This url is the full route to the source resource of this graph subject.
