AttributeDefinition.name: uid
AttributeDefinition.Description: The numerical value of the user's ID

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdlastchg
AttributeDefinition.Description: The number of days since January 1st, 1970 when the password was last changed

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdmin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Minimum number of days between password change

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdmax
AttributeDefinition.Description: The maximum number of days during which a password is valid

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdwarn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days of warning before password expires

AttributeDefinition.name: expiration
AttributeDefinition.Description: Set the date or number of days since January 1, 1970 on which the user's account will no longer be accessible

AttributeDefinition.name: inactive
AttributeDefinition.Description: Set the number of days of inactivity after a password has expired before the account is locked

AttributeDefinition.name: shell
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the user's login shell

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups which the user is a member of

AttributeDefinition.name: groupid
AttributeDefinition.Description: The numerical value of the group's ID

AttributeDefinition.name: EMAIL_ADDRESS_HOME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Home email address of the worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: ADDITIONAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS_HOME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional home email address of the worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: EMAIL_ADDRESS_WORK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Work email address of the worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: ADDITIONAL_EMAIL_ADDRESS_WORK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional work email address of the worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: CLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Combination of Position, Time Type and Employment Type

AttributeDefinition.name: COST_CENTER_HIERARCHY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Cost center hierarchy of the worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: FULLPARTTIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Type of employment full time or part time.

AttributeDefinition.name: TEAM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Team in the organization data of the worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: DIVISION
AttributeDefinition.Description: Sales channel in the organization data of worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: COUNTRY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Business site's country of a worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: CITY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Business site's city of a worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: ON_LEAVE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Leave status of the worker whether on leave

AttributeDefinition.name: COMPANY_NAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: The company under which worker belongs.

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_DAY_OF_WORK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last working day of a worker.

AttributeDefinition.name: COST_CENTER_REFERENCE_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Reference ID of organization type COST CENTER.

AttributeDefinition.name: COST_CENTER
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent the organization name whose type is COST_CENTER

AttributeDefinition.name: FUTURE_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent date of hiring/termination/onboarding incase its in future

AttributeDefinition.name: FUTURE_ACTION
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent action for worker who will be getting hire/terminate/onboard in future. e.g Hire Employee

AttributeDefinition.name: HOME_TELEPHONE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent home phone of the worker with device type telephone

AttributeDefinition.name: HOME_MOBILE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent home phone of the worker with device type mobile

AttributeDefinition.name: WORK_MOBILE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent work phone of the worker with device type mobile

AttributeDefinition.name: WORK_TELEPHONE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent work phone of the worker with device type telephone

AttributeDefinition.name: WORK_FAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent work phone of the worker with device type fax

AttributeDefinition.name: COMMENT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent COMMENT added for the PreHire

AttributeDefinition.name: DATE_PRE_HIRE_ADDED_TO_SYSTEM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent date when PreHire is added in system

AttributeDefinition.name: ELIGIBLE_FOR_HIRE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent whether Prehire is eligigle for hire or not

AttributeDefinition.name: REFFERED_BY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Represent the worker who refered the Pre-Hire

<Menu name="Workday Configuration" label="con_form_workday_config"> <Section name="Workday Configuration" label="con_form_workday_config" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_AuthenticationSettings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_AuthenticationSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/workday/help/integrating_workday/connection_settings.html"> <Field name="auth_type" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_auth_type" type="radio" defaultValue="Basic" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_auth_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option label="con_form_workday_accounts_auth_type_basic" value="Basic"/> <Option label="con_form_workday_accounts_auth_type_oauth2" value="OAuth2"/> </AllowedValues> </Field>
<Field name="url" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_url" type="url" placeHolder="placeHolder_url" required="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_url" />
<!-- Fields for 'Basic' authentication --> <Field name="user" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_username" type="text" required="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_username" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="Basic"/> <Field name="password" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_password" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="Basic" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_password" />
<!-- Fields for 'OAuth 2.0' authentication --> <Field name="grant_type" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_grant_type" type="select" defaultValue="REFRESH_TOKEN" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="OAuth2" help="help.help_con_form_workday_accounts_grant_type"> <AllowedValues> <Option label="con_form_workday_grant_type_refresh_token" value="REFRESH_TOKEN"/> </AllowedValues> </Field> <Field name="token_url" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_token_endpoint" type="url" required="true" placeHolder="placeHolder_token_url" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_tokenEndpoint" /> <Field name="client_id" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_clientId" type="text" required="true" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_clientId" /> <Field name="client_secret" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_clientSecret" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_clientSecret" /> <Field name="refresh_token" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_refreshToken" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="OAuth2" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_refreshToken" />
<Field name="ChunkSize" displayName="con_form_workday_chunk_size" type="number" min="1" max="99999" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_chunk_size" saveAsString="true"/> <Field name="customTimeOut" displayName="con_form_workday_custom_timeout" type="number" min="1" max="999" required="false" saveAsString="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_custom_timeout"/> <Field name="CustomServerTimeZone" displayName="con_form_workday_effective_time_zone" type="text" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_effective_time_zone"/> </Section> </Menu>
<Menu name="WorkdayProvisioningCredentialsConfiguration" label="con_form_workday_update_userinfo"> <Section name="WorkdayProvisioningCredentialsConfiguration" label="con_form_workday_update_userinfo" sectionInfo="con_form_workday_update_userinfo"> <Field name="provisioningUser" displayName="con_form_workday_prov_admin" type="text" required="false" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="Basic" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_update_username"/> <Field name="provisioningPassword" displayName="con_form_workday_prov_pass" type="text" placeHolder="placeHolder_organizationReferenceID" required="false" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="Basic" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_update_password"/> </Section> </Menu>
<Menu name="FilterCriteria" label="con_form_workday_filter_criteria"> <Section name="FilterCriteria" label="con_form_workday_filter_criteria" sectionInfo="con_form_workday_filter_criteria" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_AggregationFiltersSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/workday/help/integrating_workday/aggregation_settings.html"> <Field name="EffectiveDateOffset" displayName="con_form_workday_effective_offset_date" type="text" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_effective_offset_date"/>
<Field name="Organization_Reference_ID" displayName="con_form_workday_organization_reference_id" type="text" placeHolder="placeHolder_organizationReferenceID" required="false" maxlength="99999" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_organization_reference_id"/>
<Field name="IntegrationSystemID" displayName="con_form_workday_integration_systen_id" type="text" required="false" maxlength="99999" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_integration_systen_id"/>
<Field name="Integration_Field_Override_Service" displayName="con_form_workday_integration_field_override_service" type="text" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_integration_field_override_service"/>
<Field name="Integration_Field" displayName="con_form_workday_integration_field" type="text" placeHolder="placeHolder_integrationField" required="false" maxlength="99999" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_integration_field"/> <Field name="Past_Termination_Offset" displayName="con_form_workday_past_termination_offset" type="number" defaultValue="60" min="0" max="99999" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_past_termination_offset" saveAsString="true"/>
<Field name="isInactiveWorkersAllowed" displayName="con_form_workday_dont_allow_terminated" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_dont_allow_terminated"/>
<Field name="pullRescindedHiresPast" displayName="con_form_workday_aggregate_rescinded_hires_past" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_aggregate_rescinded_hires_past"/>
<Field name="pastRescindedOffset" displayName="con_form_workday_past_rescinded_offset_date" type="number" saveAsString="true" defaultValue="60" required="false" parentKey="pullRescindedHiresPast" parentValue="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_past_offset_date"/>
<Field name="pullRescindedHires" displayName="con_form_workday_aggregate_rescinded_hires" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" required="false" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_aggregate_rescinded_hires"/>
</Section> </Menu>
<Menu name="RESTClientAPIConfiguration" label="con_form_workday_rest_config"> <Section name="RESTClientAPIConfiguration" label="con_form_workday_rest_config" sectionInfo="con_form_workday_rest_config" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_AggregationFiltersSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/workday/help/integrating_workday/aggregation_settings.html">
<Field name="restEndpoint" displayName="con_form_workday_rest_endpoint" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" required="false" placeHolder="placeHolder_token_url" parentKey="auth_type" parentValue="Basic" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_restEndpoint" />
<Field name="client_id" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_clientId" type="text" required="true" parentKey="isRestConfigEnabled" parentValue="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_clientId" />
<Field name="tokenEndpoint" displayName="con_form_workday_token_endpoint" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="isRestConfigEnabled" parentValue="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_tokenEndpoint" />
<Field name="client_id" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_clientId" type="text" required="true" parentKey="isRestConfigEnabled" parentValue="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_clientId" /> <Field name="client_secret" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_clientSecret" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="isRestConfigEnabled" parentValue="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_clientSecret" /> <Field name="refresh_token" displayName="con_form_workday_accounts_refreshToken" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="isRestConfigEnabled" parentValue="true" helpKey="help_con_form_workday_accounts_refreshToken" />
</Section> </Menu>
</Form>

Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, SEARCH, UNSTRUCTURED_TARGETS, UNLOCK, ENABLE, PASSWORD
Application.name: TopSecret Full Template

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups or profile this user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: SCTYKEY
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS security keys an ACID may use.

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_COUNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of times the ACID has been used (logon times since user was defined)

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_CPU
AttributeDefinition.Description: CPU ID where last logon was done

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when last logon was done by user.

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_FAC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Facility name used for last logon

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time when last logon was done by user

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.LAST_MOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date and time when ACID was updated

AttributeDefinition.name: PHRASE_INTERVAL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days during which password phrase remains valid

AttributeDefinition.name: INTERVAL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days during which password remains valid

AttributeDefinition.name: DEFNODES
AttributeDefinition.Description: list of default routing nodes for an individual ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: CONSOLE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Ability to modify control options by ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: NOSUSPEND
AttributeDefinition.Description: ACID is allowed to bypass suspension due to violations (VTHRESH and PTHRESH)

AttributeDefinition.name: NOADSP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent data sets, created by an ACID, from being automatically secured

AttributeDefinition.name: NOATS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Automatic Terminal Signons which are made for this ACID will fail.

AttributeDefinition.name: NODSNCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA Top Secret bypasses all data set access security checks for this ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: NOLCFCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to execute any command or transaction for all facilities, regardless of LCF (Limited Command Facility) restrictions

AttributeDefinition.name: NOPWCHG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACID from changing passwords at signon or initiation

AttributeDefinition.name: NORESCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass security checking for all owned resources except data sets and volumes

AttributeDefinition.name: NOSUBCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass alternate ACID usage as well as all job submission security checking

AttributeDefinition.name: NOVOLCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass volume level security checking

AttributeDefinition.name: DUFUPD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables ACID to use the CA Top Secret Application Interface to update the installation data (INSTDATA) or field data from a Security Record. DUFUPD is a component of the CA Top Secret Dynamic Update Facility (DUF)

AttributeDefinition.name: DUFXTR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables ACID to use a RACROUTE REQUEST=AUTH (RACHECK) macro or the CA Top Secret Application Interface to extract installation data (INSTDATA) or field data from a Security File. DUFXTR is a component of the CA Top Secret Dynamic Update Facility (DUF)

AttributeDefinition.name: MULTIPW
AttributeDefinition.Description: ACID has multiple password attributes, which means ACID needs a different password to access each facility

AttributeDefinition.name: TRACE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Diagnostic trace is set on all ACID activity (initiations, resource access, violations, security mode).

AttributeDefinition.name: OIDCARD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prompt ACID to insert identification cards into a batch reader whenever signing on to TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: PHYSKEY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Physical security key to support external authentication devices.

AttributeDefinition.name: TZONE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Physical time zone in relation to CPU time zone

AttributeDefinition.name: SOURCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Source reader or terminal prefixes through which the associated ACID may enter the system.

AttributeDefinition.name: LTIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: How long (in minutes) until terminal of ACID locks if CA Top Secret does not detect activity at that terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: COMMAND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Using a specific command or subset of commands available within a facility

AttributeDefinition.name: XCOMMAND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACIDs from using a specified command or subset of commands available within that facility

AttributeDefinition.name: OPIDENT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS operator identification value equal to the ACID OPIDENT entry in the CICS SNT (Signon Table)

AttributeDefinition.name: OPPRTY
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS operator priority of associated ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: SITRAN
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS transaction CA Top Secret automatically executes after an ACID successfully signs on to a facility

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOCOMMAND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default command issued at TSO logon

AttributeDefinition.name: TSODEST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default destination identifier for TSO generated JCL for TSO users.

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOHCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default hold class for TSO-generated JCL for TSO users

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOJCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Job class for TSO generated job cards from TSO users.

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOLPROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default procedure used for TSO logon

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOLSIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default region size (in kilobytes) for TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOMCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default message class for TSO generated JCL for TSO users

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOMPW
AttributeDefinition.Description: Support multiple TSO UADS passwords, on a user-by-user basis

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOMSIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum region size (in kilobytes) that a TSO user may specify at logon

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOOPT
AttributeDefinition.Description: default options that a TSO user may specify at logon

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOSCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default SYSOUT class for TSO generated JCL for TSO users

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOUDATA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Site-defined data field to a TSO user

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOUNIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default unit name for dynamic allocations under TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: UID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Numeric UID value for security within USS

AttributeDefinition.name: DFLTGRP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default group to an ACID operating under OpenEdition MVS

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSAUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authorize the operator commands that can be entered from the console

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSCMDS
AttributeDefinition.Description: System to which commands issued from this console are sent

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSDOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Delete operator messages (DOM) this console is to receive

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSLOGC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether command responses are logged in the hard copy log

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSMGID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a one-byte migration ID is assigned to this console

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSMON
AttributeDefinition.Description: How selected system events are monitored

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSROUT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Routing codes assigned to the consoleDescription

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSSTOR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Amount of storage, in megabytes, used for message queuing

AttributeDefinition.name: MCSUD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether this console is to receive undelivered action messages and WTOR messages

AttributeDefinition.name: WAACCNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Account number for zOS APPC processing

AttributeDefinition.name: WABLDG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Building SYSOUT information is delivered to

AttributeDefinition.name: WADEPT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Department SYSOUT information is delivered to

AttributeDefinition.name: WAADDR1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional lines of SYSOUT delivery information

AttributeDefinition.name: WAADDR2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional lines of SYSOUT delivery information

AttributeDefinition.name: WAADDR3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional lines of SYSOUT delivery information

AttributeDefinition.name: WAADDR4
AttributeDefinition.Description: Additional lines of SYSOUT delivery information

AttributeDefinition.name: WANAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Who SYSOUT information is delivered to

AttributeDefinition.name: WAROOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Room SYSOUT information is delivered to

AttributeDefinition.name: LANGUAGE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Language preference code which is passed to the message processing Installation Exit

AttributeDefinition.name: IMSMSC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Level of security in effect for inbound transactions in an IMS Multiple Systems Coupling (MSC) environment.

AttributeDefinition.name: DCEFLAGS
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE flags set for this ACID in the DCE registry such as AUTOLOGIN

AttributeDefinition.name: DCENAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE principal name defined for this ACID in the DCE registry

AttributeDefinition.name: HOMECELL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Home cell for this DCE ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: HOMEUUID
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE Home cell universal unique identifier of ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: UUID
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE principal universal unique identifier of ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVCTL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a security check is performed for this NetView operator when trying to use a span or trying to do a cross-domain logon (GENERAL, GLOBAL, SPECIFIC)

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVDMNS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifiers of NetView programs in another NetView domain where this operator can start a cross-domain session

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Command or command list to be processed by NetView for this operator when this operator logs on to NetView

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVMSGR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether this operator is to receive unsolicited messages that are not routed to a specific NetView operator

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVNGMF
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a NetView operator has administrator authority to the NetView Graphic Monitor Facility (NGMF)

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVOPCL
AttributeDefinition.Description: NetView scope classes for which the operator has authority

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.ACID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority levels at which ACID can manage ACIDs within scope

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.DATA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to list Security File information

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.MISC1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more administrative functions (LCF, INSTDATA, USER, LTIME, SUSPEND, NOATS, RDT, TSSSIM, ALL)

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.MISC2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more administrative functions (ALL, SMS, TSO, NDT, DLF, APPCLU, WORKATTR, TARGET)

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.MISC3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more administrative functions (ALL, SDT, PTOK)

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.MISC8
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to list the contents of the RDT, FDT or STC or to use the ASUSPEND administrative function (LISTRDT, LISTSTC, LISTAPLU, LISTSDT, MCS, NOMVSDF, PWMAINT, REMASUSP, ALL)

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.MISC9
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more high-level administrative functions (BYPASS, TRACE, CONSOLE, MASTFAC, MODE, STC, GLOBAL, GENERIC, ALL)

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.RESOURCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to issue ADDTO, LIST, REMOVE, PERMIT, REVOKE, and WHOHAS commands for a specific resource class defined in the RDT applied to any ACID owned within its administrative scope

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.FACILITY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Which facility or facilities an ACID may access

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.SCOPE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Limit the SCOPE of ACID authority based on these values

AttributeDefinition.name: CONN_CHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups or profile this user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUXNODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Linux nodes in NDT node list of ACID record

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.LAST_MOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date and time when ACID was updated

AttributeDefinition.name: AUDIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow an audit of ACID activity

AttributeDefinition.name: NOSUSPEND
AttributeDefinition.Description: ACID is allowed to bypass suspension due to violations (VTHRESH and PTHRESH)

AttributeDefinition.name: NOADSP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent data sets, created by an ACID, from being automatically secured

AttributeDefinition.name: NOATS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Automatic Terminal Signons which are made for this ACID will fail

AttributeDefinition.name: NODSNCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA Top Secret bypasses all data set access security checks for this ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: NOLCFCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to execute any command or transaction for all facilities, regardless of LCF (Limited Command Facility) restrictions

AttributeDefinition.name: NOPWCHG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACID from changing passwords at signon or initiation

AttributeDefinition.name: NORESCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass security checking for all owned resources except data sets and volumes

AttributeDefinition.name: NOSUBCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass alternate ACID usage as well as all job submission security checking

AttributeDefinition.name: NOVOLCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass volume level security checking

AttributeDefinition.name: DUFUPD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables ACID to use the CA Top Secret Application Interface to update the installation data (INSTDATA) or field data from a Security Record. DUFUPD is a component of the CA Top Secret Dynamic Update Facility (DUF)

AttributeDefinition.name: DUFXTR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables ACID to use a RACROUTE REQUEST=AUTH (RACHECK) macro or the CA Top Secret Application Interface to extract installation data (INSTDATA) or field data from a Security File. DUFXTR is a component of the CA Top Secret Dynamic Update Facility (DUF)

AttributeDefinition.name: TRACE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Diagnostic trace is set on all ACID activity (initiations, resource access, violations, security mode)

AttributeDefinition.name: OIDCARD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prompt ACID to insert identification cards into a batch reader whenever signing on to TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: TZONE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Physical time zone in relation to CPU time zone

AttributeDefinition.name: LTIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: How long (in minutes) until terminal of ACID locks if CA Top Secret does not detect activity at that terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: COMMAND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Using a specific command or subset of commands available within a facility

AttributeDefinition.name: XCOMMAND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACIDs from using a specified command or subset of commands available within that facility

AttributeDefinition.name: OPIDENT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS operator identification value equal to the ACID OPIDENT entry in the CICS SNT (Signon Table)

AttributeDefinition.name: OPPRTY
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS operator priority of associated ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: SITRAN
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS transaction CA Top Secret automatically executes after an ACID successfully signs on to a facility

AttributeDefinition.name: LANGUAGE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Language preference code which is passed to the message processing Installation Exit

AttributeDefinition.name: SCTYKEY
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS security keys an ACID may use

AttributeDefinition.name: SOURCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Source reader or terminal prefixes through which the associated ACID may enter the system

Application.name: Ivanti Cherwell

Script.Source: if(identity.getManager() != null) { return identity.getManager().getName(); } else return ""

AttributeDefinition.name: busObRecId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Ivanti Cherwell Business Object Record ID

AttributeDefinition.name: busObPublicId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Ivanti Cherwell Business Object Public ID

AttributeDefinition.name: shortDisplayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: A shortened version of the user's display name

AttributeDefinition.name: accountLocked
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user account is locked

AttributeDefinition.name: createDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date and time the user account was created

AttributeDefinition.name: lastPasswordResetDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date the user's password was last reset

AttributeDefinition.name: lastResetDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date the user was last reset

AttributeDefinition.name: passwordNeverExpires
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user's password expires

AttributeDefinition.name: userCannotChangePassword
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user cannot change their password

AttributeDefinition.name: userMustResetPasswordAtNextLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user must change their password at the next login

AttributeDefinition.name: ldapRequired
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user account requires LDAP

AttributeDefinition.name: CreatedBy
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the user who created the record

AttributeDefinition.name: CreatedByID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The record ID of the user who created the record

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModifiedDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date and time the user account was last modified

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModBy
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the user who modified the record

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModifiedByID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The record ID of the user who modified the record

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModByID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The record ID of the customer who last modified the record

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date and time a customer account was last modified

AttributeDefinition.name: NamePrefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's prefix. For example, Mr. or Mrs.

AttributeDefinition.name: NameSuffix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's suffix. For example, Jr. or Sr.

AttributeDefinition.name: LastLogon
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date and time of the customer's last logon session

AttributeDefinition.name: LastModTimeStamp
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date and time of the last time the record was modified

AttributeDefinition.name: OwnedBy
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the customer's owner

AttributeDefinition.name: OwnedByID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ID of the customer's owner

AttributeDefinition.name: OwnedByTeam
AttributeDefinition.Description: The team of the customer's owner

AttributeDefinition.name: securityGroupId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the security group that the user belongs to

Application.name: MongoDB Template

AttributeDefinition.name: Labels
AttributeDefinition.Description: Key-value pairs that tag and categorize the database user

AttributeDefinition.name: LDAP Auth Type
AttributeDefinition.Description: Describes the type of LDAP authentication

AttributeDefinition.name: Delete After Date
AttributeDefinition.Description: Attribute related to temporary user, who will get deleted after this specified date. For example, 2021-04-18T03:28:17+00:00

AttributeDefinition.name: X509 Type
AttributeDefinition.Description: Describes the type of X509 authentication

AttributeDefinition.name: Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Collections on which the roles apply

AttributeDefinition.name: Native Identity
AttributeDefinition.Description: Combination of role name and database name

AttributeDefinition.name: Actions
AttributeDefinition.Description: Actions associated to the role in JSON format

AttributeDefinition.name: Inherited Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Inherited Roles associated to the role in JSON format

Application.Settings:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <!-- Copyright (C) 2021 SailPoint Technologies, Inc. All rights reserved. -->
<Form xmlns='http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd' name='MongoDB Cloud - Database' connectorName="MongoDB Cloud - Database" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released" shortDesc="ShortDesc">
<Menu name="Connection Settings" label="con_form_new_Mongo_setting"> <Section name="Connection Settings" label="con_form_new_Mongo_setting" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_Credentials" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_ConnectionSettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/mongodb/cloud_db/help/"> <Field name="url" required="true" displayName="con_form_Mongo_ApiUrl" helpKey="help_con_Mongo_apiurl" type="url" defaultValue="https://cloud.mongodb.com/api/atlas/v1.0/" /> <Field name="publicKey" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_Mongo_PublicKey" helpKey="help_con_Mongo_publickey" /> <Field name="privateKey" type="secret" required="true" displayName="con_form_Mongo_PrivateKey" helpKey="help_con_Mongo_privatekey" /> <Field name="projectName" type="text" required="true" displayName="con_form_Mongo_conn_projectName" helpKey="help_con_Mongo_conn_projectName" /> <Field name="pageSize" type="number" defaultValue="100" displayName="con_form_Mongo_page_size" helpKey="help_con_Mongo_PageSize" min="1" max="500" saveAsString="true" /> <Field name="connTimeout" type="number" defaultValue="1" displayName="con_form_Mongo_conn_timeout" helpKey="help_con_Mongo_conn_timeout" saveAsString="true"/> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

Application.name: Coupa

AttributeDefinition.name: employee-payment-channel
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's expense payment channel. For example: ERP, CoupaPay, etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: authentication-method
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's authentication method. For example: coupa_credentials or SAML

AttributeDefinition.name: purchasing-user
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user has a purchasing license

AttributeDefinition.name: expense-user
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user has an expense license

AttributeDefinition.name: sourcing-user
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user has a sourcing license

AttributeDefinition.name: inventory-user
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user has an inventory license

AttributeDefinition.name: contracts-user
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user has a contracts license

AttributeDefinition.name: sso-identifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's Single Sign-on ID (SSO ID)

AttributeDefinition.name: api-user
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user is an API User

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of roles associated with the user

AttributeDefinition.name: user-groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of user groups associated with the user

AttributeDefinition.name: content-groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of content groups associated with the user

AttributeDefinition.name: account-groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of account groups associated with the user

AttributeDefinition.name: omnipotent
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the role is an administrative role

AttributeDefinition.name: updated-at
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp for the last time the role received an update.

AttributeDefinition.name: system-role
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the role is a system role

Application.Settings:

Application.Settings:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <!-- Copyright (C) 2022 SailPoint Technologies, Inc. All rights reserved. --> <Form xmlns='http://www.sailpoint.com/xsd/sailpoint_form_2_0.xsd' name="JDBC" connectorName="JDBC" type="SourceConfig" directConnect="true" status="released" shortDesc="ShortDesc"> <BaseConfig> <Field name="fileUpload" maxFiles="15" supportedExtensions="jar" type="fileupload" maxSize="75" validateJSON="false" /> </BaseConfig> <Menu name="querySettings" label="menuLabel_querySettings"> <Section name="querySettings" label="sectionLabel_querySettings" sectionInfo="sectionInfo_querySettings" docLinkLabel="docLinkLabel_querySettings" docLink="https://documentation.sailpoint.com/connectors/jdbc/help/"> <Field name="querySettings" editButton="true" displayName="" type="schemaCardList"> <Menu name="connectionSettings" label="sectionLabel_connectionSettings"> <Field name="user" displayName="user" type="text" required="true" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"/> <Field name="password" displayName="password" type="secret" required="true" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"/> <Field name="url" displayName="url" type="text" required="true" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account" defaultValue="jdbc:mysql://<hostname>/<dbname>" helpKey="helpKey_tlsConnection" maxlength="99999"/> <Field name="driverClass" displayName="driverClass" type="text" required="true" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account" defaultValue="com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver"/> <Field name="additionalConnProperties" type="list" required="false" displayName="additionalConnProperties" placeHolder="placeHolder_additionalConnProperties" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account" helpKey="helpKey_additionalConnProperties"/> <Field name="user" displayName="user" type="text" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentKeyValueOperation='not' parentValue="account"/> <Field name="password" displayName="password" type="secret" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentKeyValueOperation='not' parentValue="account"/> <Field name="url" displayName="url" type="text" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentKeyValueOperation='not' parentValue="account" helpKey="helpKey_tlsConnection" maxlength="99999"/> <Field name="driverClass" displayName="driverClass" type="text" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentKeyValueOperation='not' parentValue="account"/> </Menu>
<Menu name="querySettings" label="menuLabel_querySettings"> <Field name="testConnSQL" displayName="testConnSQL" type="textarea" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"/> <Field name="useStoredProcedureTestConn" displayName="useStoredProcedureTestConn" type="checkbox" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"/> <Field name="SQL" displayName="SQL" type="textarea" required="true" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"/> <Field name="SQL" displayName="groupSQL" type="textarea" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentKeyValueOperation='not' parentValue="account" /> <Field name="useStoredProcedureSqlStmt" displayName="useStoredProcedureSqlStmt" type="checkbox" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"/> <Field name="useStoredProcedureSqlStmt" displayName="useStoredProcedureSqlStmtForGroup" type="checkbox" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentKeyValueOperation='not' parentValue="account"/> <Field name="getObjectSQL" displayName="getObjectSQL" type="textarea" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"/> <Field name="getObjectSQL" displayName="getObjectGroupSQL" type="textarea" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentKeyValueOperation='not' parentValue="account"/> <Field name="useStoredProcedureGetObject" displayName="useStoredProcedureGetObject" type="checkbox" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account" /> <Field name="useStoredProcedureGetObject" displayName="useStoredProcedureGetObjectGroup" type="checkbox" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentKeyValueOperation='not' parentValue="account"/> </Menu>
<Menu name="addQuerySettings" label="menuLabel_addQuerySettings"> <Field name="useExecuteQuery" displayName="useExecuteQuery" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" helpKey="helpKey_useExecuteQuery"/> <Field name="isPermissionEnabled" defaultValue="false" type="toggle" displayName="isPermissionEnabled"/> <Field name="getDirectPermObjectSQL" type="textarea" displayName="getDirectPermObjectSQL" parentKey="isPermissionEnabled" parentValue="true"/> <Field name="useStoredProcedureDirectPermission" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" displayName="useStoredProcedureDirectPermission" parentKey="isPermissionEnabled" parentValue="true"/> </Menu>
<Menu name="deltaAggregation" label="menuLabel_deltaAggregation" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"> <Field name="deltaAggregationEnabled" displayName="deltaAggregation" type="toggle" defaultValue="false" parentKey="sp__schemaType" parentValue="account"/> <Field name="deltaTable" defaultValue="USER_DELTA" displayName="deltaTable" type="text" parentKey="deltaAggregationEnabled" parentValue="true"/> <Field name="getDeltaSQL" type="textarea" displayName="getDeltaSQL" parentKey="deltaAggregationEnabled" parentValue="true"/> <Field name="useStoredProcedureDelta" type="checkbox" defaultValue="false" displayName="useStoredProcedureDelta" parentKey="deltaAggregationEnabled" parentValue="true"/> </Menu> </Field> </Section> </Menu> </Form>

AttributeDefinition.name: middleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: the middle name for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: suffix
AttributeDefinition.Description: the suffix (or list of suffixes) for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: privilege
AttributeDefinition.Description: the privileges assigned to the personnel

AttributeDefinition.name: birthdate
AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time of birth for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: username
AttributeDefinition.Description: the user name associated with the account. The value of the user name field must be unique within the system.

AttributeDefinition.name: directoryIndicator
AttributeDefinition.Description: It contains an indicator of whether or not the user is an LDAP directory user.

AttributeDefinition.name: restriction
AttributeDefinition.Description: the restrictions given to an account.

AttributeDefinition.name: title
AttributeDefinition.Description: the title (or list of titles) for the personnel, Dr. Mr. etc

AttributeDefinition.name: physicianInd
AttributeDefinition.Description: an indicator of whether or not the personnel is a physician

AttributeDefinition.name: position
AttributeDefinition.Description: the position assigned to the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: beginEffectiveDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time at which the personnel becomes/became effective

AttributeDefinition.name: endEffectiveDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time at which the personnel ceases/ceased to be effective.

AttributeDefinition.name: organizationGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: organization groups associated to the personnel

AttributeDefinition.name: confidentialityLevel
AttributeDefinition.Description: the confidentiality level that applies to the relationship with organization

AttributeDefinition.name: npi
AttributeDefinition.Description: National Provider Identifier of the provider

AttributeDefinition.name: sourceOfData
AttributeDefinition.Description: Data Source for the provider record

AttributeDefinition.name: dateOfBirth
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date Of Birth of the provider

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The blueprint name / the provider name applied by the blueprint

AttributeDefinition.name: clinicalTitle
AttributeDefinition.Description: The 'Clinician / Title' applied by the blueprint

AttributeDefinition.name: referralSourceType
AttributeDefinition.Description: The 'Referral Source Type' applied by the blueprint

Field.name: ContactComment
Field.value: Epic account created by SailPoint Identity Management.

AttributeDefinition.name: StartDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: Start date of the user account

AttributeDefinition.name: EndDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: End date of the user account

AttributeDefinition.name: IsActive
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether this User is allowed to log into Epic

AttributeDefinition.name: IsBlocked
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether this User is blocked from logging into Epic

AttributeDefinition.name: BlockReason
AttributeDefinition.Description: The reason why the User account is blocked

AttributeDefinition.name: BlockComment
AttributeDefinition.Description: A freetext comment about why the User is blocked

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedProviderID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Linked Provider Id of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: DefaultLinkedTemplateID
AttributeDefinition.Description: The default linkable template for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedTemplateID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Linked template Id of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedTemplateConfig
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of LinkedTemplateConfig objects pointing to the template setup for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: ExternalIdentifiers
AttributeDefinition.Description: External identifiers are specifically used to allow a lightweight way to manage user identity in multiple systems

AttributeDefinition.name: CustomUserDictionaries
AttributeDefinition.Description: Custom dictionaries allow users to maintain their own spellcheck corrections

AttributeDefinition.name: ContactDate
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date the User was created. Defaults to the current date if not provided

AttributeDefinition.name: ContactComment
AttributeDefinition.Description: A comment associated with the most recent revision of the User's record

AttributeDefinition.name: UserDictionaryPath
AttributeDefinition.Description: The file path at which custom user dictionary files can be found

AttributeDefinition.name: LDAPOverrideID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A string that can be provided to identify the User to the LDAP server in place of the SystemLogin

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportGrouper1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportGrouper2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportGrouper3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: UserPhotoPath
AttributeDefinition.Description: A URL or file path to a picture of this user

AttributeDefinition.name: Sex
AttributeDefinition.Description: The User's legal sex, typically. Valid values include the Male, Female, Unknown

AttributeDefinition.name: ProviderAtLoginOption
AttributeDefinition.Description: How shall the User be prompted to choose an associated provider upon login

AttributeDefinition.name: ForceContactCreation
AttributeDefinition.Description: If true, the provided values will be filed to a new "contact" for the User, meaning that previous values will be retained

AttributeDefinition.name: EmployeeDemographics
AttributeDefinition.Description: This parameter is used to provide certain specific information about the user

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper4
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper5
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: CategoryReportGrouper6
AttributeDefinition.Description: Report groupers are used to segregate users for highly specific reporting and statistics needs

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_AcademicTitle
AttributeDefinition.Description: Academic title of the user. e.g. Phd, MD, Dr, DDS, DD etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_FatherName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's father's name, typically used for constructing Arabic names

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_FirstName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The first or given name of the User

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_GrandfatherName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's grandfather's name, typically used for constructing Arabic names

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_LastName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's last or family name

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_PrimaryTitle
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary title of the user. e.g Mr., Miss, Dr., Ms. etc.

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_SpouseLastName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last, or family name of the user's spouse

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_SpouseLastNameFirst
AttributeDefinition.Description: "Yes" or "No." If "Yes", the spouse's last name will appear first in the hyphenated last name

AttributeDefinition.name: UserComplexName_Suffix
AttributeDefinition.Description: Suffix of user e.g. Sr., Jr., I, II, III

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_ReceiveExternalEmail
AttributeDefinition.Description: This controls whether users receive notification emails from EpicCare link

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_ReceiveGroupNotifications
AttributeDefinition.Description: This controls whether users receive group notification emails from EpicCare link

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_Deactivated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Signifies a user should no longer have access to the application

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_SiteManagerContexts
AttributeDefinition.Description: This links users to EpicCare Link user context groups for the purposes of site management

AttributeDefinition.name: CommunityUser_UserContexts
AttributeDefinition.Description: This links users to EpicCare Link user context groups

AttributeDefinition.name: UserGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: The current list of User Groups for the selected user

AttributeDefinition.name: BIDefaultUser
AttributeDefinition.Description: The BI default user name for the Hyperspace user, which is used by Hyperspace to connect to BI applications

AttributeDefinition.name: PreferredLoginDepartments
AttributeDefinition.Description: The departments on the user's preferred list

AttributeDefinition.name: LoginDepartmentFilterList
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of departments to use when limiting access for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: LoginDepartmentFilterSetting
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether the Department Filter List is Inclusive or Exclusive

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedServiceAreas
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of service areas for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedLocations
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of locations for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedDepartments
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of Departments for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedDepartmentGroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of department groups for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedUsers
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of users for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: ReportAuthorizedProviders
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of providers for which the user has access

AttributeDefinition.name: UsersManagers
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's manager ids

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedSubtemplateIDs
AttributeDefinition.Description: ID of the Linked Sub template

AttributeDefinition.name: LinkedSubTemplateName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the Linked Sub template

Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, AUTHENTICATE, PASSWORD, ENABLE, SEARCH, DIRECT_PERMISSIONS, NO_PERMISSIONS_PROVISIONING
Application.name: GE Centricity

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordExpired
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag that indicates if the user password expired

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordLastChanged
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date timestamp of user last password changed

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordNeverExpires
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag indicates the user neverexpires password

AttributeDefinition.name: LastLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date timestamp of user last login

AttributeDefinition.name: LastFailedLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date timestamp of user last failed login

AttributeDefinition.name: Rights
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of rights defined for user

AttributeDefinition.name: ProductID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the Product mapped to Role

AttributeDefinition.name: VTBMenuKey
AttributeDefinition.Description: Menukey which is mapped to each Role

Application.featuresString: DISCOVER_SCHEMA, PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, ENABLE, PASSWORD, UNSTRUCTURED_TARGETS
Application.name: Privileged Account Management

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier of the User.

AttributeDefinition.name: userName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier for the User, typically used by the user to directly authenticate to the service provider.

AttributeDefinition.name: name.formatted
AttributeDefinition.Description: The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display (e.g., 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

AttributeDefinition.name: name.familyName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Jensen' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

AttributeDefinition.name: name.givenName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Barbara' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

AttributeDefinition.name: name.middleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The middle name(s) of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

AttributeDefinition.name: name.honorificPrefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or title in most Western languages (e.g., 'Ms.' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

AttributeDefinition.name: name.honorificSuffix
AttributeDefinition.Description: The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or suffix in most Western languages (e.g., 'III' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the User, suitable for display to end-users. The name SHOULD be the full name of the User being described, if known.

AttributeDefinition.name: nickName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The casual way to address the user in real life, e.g., 'Bob' or 'Bobby' instead of 'Robert'. This attribute SHOULD NOT be used to represent a User's username (e.g., 'bjensen' or 'mpepperidge').

AttributeDefinition.name: profileUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: A fully qualified URL pointing to a page representing the User's online profile.

AttributeDefinition.name: title
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's title, such as "Vice President."

AttributeDefinition.name: userType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Used to identify the relationship between the organization and the user. Typical values used might be 'Contractor', 'Employee', 'Intern', 'Temp', 'External', and 'Unknown', but any value may be used.

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the User's preferred written or spoken language. Generally used for selecting a localized user interface; e.g., 'en_US' specifies the language English and country US.

AttributeDefinition.name: locale
AttributeDefinition.Description: Used to indicate the User's default location for purposes of localizing items such as currency, date time format, or numerical representations.

AttributeDefinition.name: timezone
AttributeDefinition.Description: The User's time zone in the 'Olson' time zone database format, e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'.

AttributeDefinition.name: active
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean value indicating the User's administrative status.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.work.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.work.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.work.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes. READ-ONLY.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.work.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes. READ-ONLY.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.home.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.home.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.home.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes. READ-ONLY.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.home.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes. READ-ONLY.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.other.primary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.other.secondary.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.other.primary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes. READ-ONLY.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails.other.secondary.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes. READ-ONLY.

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of groups to which the user belongs, either through direct membership, through nested groups, or dynamically calculated.

AttributeDefinition.name: source
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the external application on which the object lives. If this is a PAM local object, this is null.

AttributeDefinition.name: nativeIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: The native identifier of the object on the external application (eg - the LDAP DN). If this is a PAM local object, this is null.

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier of the Container

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name of the container. This is optional. If null, the name will be used as the display name.

AttributeDefinition.name: type
AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of container (eg - management set or account store). This is optional if the PAM system does not support multiple types of containers.

AttributeDefinition.name: owner.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ID of the user that owns this container

AttributeDefinition.name: owner.$ref
AttributeDefinition.Description: A URI reference to the user that owns this container.

AttributeDefinition.name: owner.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name of the user that owns this container

AttributeDefinition.name: privilegedData.value
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ID of the privileged data.

AttributeDefinition.name: privilegedData.$ref
AttributeDefinition.Description: A URI reference to the PrivilegedData

AttributeDefinition.name: privilegedData.display
AttributeDefinition.Description: The displayable value of the PrivilegedData

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier of the PrivilegedData.

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: A descriptive name for this piece of PrivilegedData. For example, root@mylinuxhost

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: A description for this piece of PrivilegedData.

AttributeDefinition.name: type
AttributeDefinition.Description: The type of PrivilegedData. The value will be dependent on what is supported by the PAM system. Examples include 'credential', 'ssh key', 'file', etc...

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier of the Group

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: A human-readable name for the Group. REQUIRED.

AttributeDefinition.name: members
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of members of the Group.

AttributeDefinition.name: source
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the external application on which the object lives. If this is a PAM local object, this is null.

AttributeDefinition.name: nativeIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: The native identifier of the object on the external application (eg - the LDAP DN). If this is a PAM local object, this is null.
